10810730Di2015UniqueSeparatorasync Task MyOuterMethod() {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // let's say there is a list of 1000+ URLsDi2015NewLine    string[] urls = { "http://google.com", "http://yahoo.com", ... };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // now let's send HTTP requests to each of these URLs in parallelDi2015NewLine    List<Task> allTasks = new List<Task>();Di2015NewLine    SemaphoreSlim throttler = new SemaphoreSlim(initialCount: 20);Di2015NewLine    foreach (var url in urls) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // do an async wait until we can schedule againDi2015NewLine        await throttler.WaitAsync();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // using Task.Run(...) to run the lambda in its own parallelDi2015NewLine        // flow on the threadpoolDi2015NewLine        allTasks.Add(Task.Run(async () => {Di2015NewLine            try {Di2015NewLine                var client = new HttpClient();Di2015NewLine                var html = await client.GetStringAsync(url);Di2015NewLine            } finally {Di2015NewLine                throttler.Release();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // won't get here until all urls have been put into tasksDi2015NewLine    await Task.WhenAll(allTasks);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // won't get here until all tasks have completed in some wayDi2015NewLine    // (either success or exception)Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10811827Di2015UniqueSeparatorGetHashCode()
10811827Di2015UniqueSeparator    public class PersonInfo : IEquatable<PersonInfo>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public string Login { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public string FirstName { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public string LastName { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public int Age { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public bool Active { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool Equals(PersonInfo other)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Check whether the compared object is null.Di2015NewLine            if (Object.ReferenceEquals(other, null)) return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Check whether the compared object references the same data.Di2015NewLine            if (Object.ReferenceEquals(this, other)) return true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Check whether the properties are equal.Di2015NewLine            return Login.Equals(other.Login) && FirstName.Equals(other.FirstName) && LastName.Equals(other.LastName) && Age.Equals(other.Age) && Active.Equals(other.Active);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override int GetHashCode()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int hashLogin = Login == null ? 0 : Login.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int hashFirstName = FirstName == null ? 0 : FirstName.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int hashLastName = LastName == null ? 0 : LastName.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int hashAge = Age.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int hashActive = Active.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Calculate the hash code.Di2015NewLine            return (hashLogin + hashFirstName + hashLastName) ^ (hashAge + hashActive);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

10816421Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Stack<T>{Di2015NewLine   readonly T _head;Di2015NewLine   readonly Stack<T> _tail;Di2015NewLine   public Stack(T head,Stack<T> tail){Di2015NewLine       _head = head;Di2015NewLine       _tail = tail;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   public Stack<T> Push(T element){Di2015NewLine       return new Stack<T>(element,this);Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   public IEnumerator<T> GetEnumerator(){Di2015NewLine         yield return _head;Di2015NewLine         var current = _tail;Di2015NewLine         while(_tail != null){Di2015NewLine             yield return current._head;Di2015NewLine             current = current._tail;Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
10816421Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Stack<T>{Di2015NewLine   T[] _heads;Di2015NewLine   T[] _tail;Di2015NewLine   int _next;Di2015NewLine   public Stack(T head,T[] tail){Di2015NewLine       _heads = new T[tail.length];Di2015NewLine       _next = _heads.Length -2; Di2015NewLine       _heads[_heads.Length -1] = head;Di2015NewLine       _tail = tail;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   public void Push(T element){Di2015NewLine        if(_next < 0){Di2015NewLine            var length = _heads.Length;Di2015NewLine            var _new = new T[length * 2];Di2015NewLine            _heads = new T[length * 2];                Di2015NewLine            _next = length * 2-1;Di2015NewLine            Array.Copy(_heads,_new,length);Di2015NewLine            Array.Copy(_tails,0,_new,length,length);Di2015NewLine            _tails = _new;Di2015NewLine        } else{Di2015NewLine            _heads[_next--] = element;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   public IEnumerator<T> GetEnumerator(){Di2015NewLine         yield return _head;Di2015NewLine         var current = _tail;Di2015NewLine         while(_tail != null){Di2015NewLine             yield return current._head;Di2015NewLine             current = current._tail;Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10819867Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class SortedListExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ///Add item to sortedList (numeric key) to next available key item, and return keyDi2015NewLine    public static int AddNext<T>(this SortedList<int, T> sortedList, T item)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int key = 1; // Make it 0 to start from Zero based indexDi2015NewLine        int count = sortedList.Count;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int counter=0;Di2015NewLine        doDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (count == 0) break;Di2015NewLine            int nextKeyInList = sortedList.Keys[counter++];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (key != nextKeyInList) break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            key = nextKeyInList +1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (count == 1 || counter == count  ) break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (key != sortedList.Keys[counter])Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        } while (true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        sortedList.Add(key, item);Di2015NewLine        return key;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10822894Di2015UniqueSeparatorSystem.Windows.Ink.Stroke newStroke = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void inkPresenterSample_PreviewMouseDown(object sender, MouseButtonEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        inkPresenterSample.CaptureMouse();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //get mouse position and add first point to a new line to be drawnDi2015NewLine        var mousePosition = e.GetPosition(inkPresenterSample);Di2015NewLine        var stylusStartPoint = new StylusPointCollection();Di2015NewLine        stylusStartPoint.Add(new StylusPoint(mousePosition.X, mousePosition.Y));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //set line's attributes, it real application this should be probably done outside this methodDi2015NewLine        var drawingAttributes = new System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes();Di2015NewLine        //IMPORTANT: semi-transparent color is used, so the opacity effect is visibleDi2015NewLine        drawingAttributes.Color = System.Windows.Media.Color.FromArgb(110, 0, 0, 0);Di2015NewLine        drawingAttributes.Width = 10;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //create a new stroke to be drawnDi2015NewLine        newStroke = new System.Windows.Ink.Stroke(stylusStartPoint, drawingAttributes);Di2015NewLine        newStroke.StylusPoints.Add(new StylusPoint(mousePosition.X, mousePosition.Y));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //add reference to a new stroke to the InkPresenter controlDi2015NewLine        inkPresenterSample.Strokes.Add(newStroke);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void inkPresenterSample_PreviewMouseUp(object sender, MouseButtonEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        inkPresenterSample.ReleaseMouseCapture();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (newStroke != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            newStroke = null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void inkPresenterSample_PreviewMouseMove(object sender, MouseEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //if a stroke is currently drawn in the InkPresenterDi2015NewLine        if (newStroke != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //add a new point to the strokeDi2015NewLine            var mousePosition = e.GetPosition(inkPresenterSample);Di2015NewLine            newStroke.StylusPoints.Add(new StylusPoint(mousePosition.X, mousePosition.Y));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

10829462Di2015UniqueSeparator// A buffer for the incoming data strings.Di2015NewLinestring buffer = string.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void serialPort1_DataReceived(object sender, System.IO.Ports.SerialDataReceivedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  // buffer up the latest data.Di2015NewLine  buffer += serialPort1.ReadExisting();;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // there could be more than one packet in the data so we have to keep looping.Di2015NewLine  bool done = false;Di2015NewLine  while (!done)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       // check for a complete message.Di2015NewLine       int start = buffer.IndexOf(":");Di2015NewLine       int end = buffer.IndexOf(";");Di2015NewLine       if (start > -1 && end > -1 && start < end)Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine          // A complete packet is in the buffer.Di2015NewLine          string packet = buffer.Substring(start + 1, (end - start) - 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine          // remove the packet from the buffer.Di2015NewLine          buffer = buffer.Remove(start, (end - start) + 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine          // split the packet up in to it's parameters.Di2015NewLine          string[] parameters = packet.Split('*');Di2015NewLine          rx1 = parameters[0];Di2015NewLine          ry1 = parameters[1];Di2015NewLine          dot = parameters[2];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine       done = true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10829774Di2015UniqueSeparatorStringComparer
10829774Di2015UniqueSeparatorClass CaseInsensitiveIgnoringStringComparerDi2015NewLine    Inherits StringComparerDi2015NewLine    Private caseInsentiveComparer As System.StringComparer = StringComparer.OrdinalIgnoreCaseDi2015NewLine    Public Property IgnoreList As IList(Of String) = NothingDi2015NewLine    Public Property ReplaceWith As String = " "Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Private Function Replace(original As String) As StringDi2015NewLine        If IgnoreList Is Nothing OrElse IgnoreList.Count = 0 ThenDi2015NewLine            Return originalDi2015NewLine        ElseDi2015NewLine            For Each s As String In IgnoreListDi2015NewLine                original = original.Replace(s, ReplaceWith)Di2015NewLine            NextDi2015NewLine            Return originalDi2015NewLine        End IfDi2015NewLine    End FunctionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Public Overloads Overrides Function Compare(x As String, y As String) As IntegerDi2015NewLine        Return caseInsentiveComparer.Compare(Replace(x), Replace(y))Di2015NewLine    End FunctionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Public Overloads Overrides Function Equals(x As String, y As String) As BooleanDi2015NewLine        Return caseInsentiveComparer.Equals(Replace(x), Replace(y))Di2015NewLine    End FunctionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Public Overloads Overrides Function GetHashCode(obj As String) As IntegerDi2015NewLine        Return caseInsentiveComparer.GetHashCode(Replace(obj))Di2015NewLine    End FunctionDi2015NewLineEnd ClassDi2015NewLine

10830213Di2015UniqueSeparatorCREATE FUNCTION [dbo].[Split](@String varchar(8000), @Delimiter char(1))       Di2015NewLinereturns @temptable TABLE (items varchar(8000))       Di2015NewLineas       Di2015NewLinebegin       Di2015NewLine    declare @idx int       Di2015NewLine    declare @slice varchar(8000)       Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    select @idx = 1       Di2015NewLine        if len(@String)<1 or @String is null  return       Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while @idx!= 0       Di2015NewLine    begin       Di2015NewLine        set @idx = charindex(@Delimiter,@String)       Di2015NewLine        if @idx!=0       Di2015NewLine            set @slice = left(@String,@idx - 1)       Di2015NewLine        else       Di2015NewLine            set @slice = @String       Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if(len(@slice)>0)  Di2015NewLine            insert into @temptable(Items) values(@slice)       Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        set @String = right(@String,len(@String) - @idx)       Di2015NewLine        if len(@String) = 0 break       Di2015NewLine    end   Di2015NewLinereturn  Di2015NewLine

10830782Di2015UniqueSeparator/AFFINITY <hex affinity mask>
10830782Di2015UniqueSeparatorAFFINITY    Specifies the processor affinity mask as a hexadecimal number.Di2015NewLine            The process is restricted to running on these processors.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            The affinity mask is interpreted differently when /AFFINITY andDi2015NewLine            /NODE are combined.  Specify the affinity mask as if the NUMADi2015NewLine            node's processor mask is right shifted to begin at bit zero.Di2015NewLine            The process is restricted to running on those processors inDi2015NewLine            common between the specified affinity mask and the NUMA node.Di2015NewLine            If no processors are in common, the process is restricted toDi2015NewLine            running on the specified NUMA node.Di2015NewLine

10831688Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static void ProcessStart(string ExecutablePath, string sArgs, bool bWait)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        System.Diagnostics.Process proc = new System.Diagnostics.Process();Di2015NewLine        proc.EnableRaisingEvents = false;Di2015NewLine        proc.StartInfo.FileName = ExecutablePath;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if(sArgs.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine            proc.StartInfo.Arguments = sArgs;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        proc.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if(bWait)Di2015NewLine            proc.WaitForExit();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if(ProcessLive(ExecutablePath))Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            return false;               Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
10831688Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static bool ProcessLive(string ExecutablePath)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string strTargetProcessName = System.IO.Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(ExecutablePath);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            System.Diagnostics.Process[] Processes = System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcessesByName(strTargetProcessName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach(System.Diagnostics.Process p in Processes)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                foreach(System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule m in p.Modules)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if(ExecutablePath.ToLower() == m.FileName.ToLower())Di2015NewLine                        return true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch(Exception){}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

10835170Di2015UniqueSeparatorIntersect
10835170Di2015UniqueSeparatorList<T> Intersect<T>(List<T> first, List<T> second) {Di2015NewLine    Dictionary<T, T> potential = new Dictionary<T, T>();Di2015NewLine    foreach (var item in first) {Di2015NewLine        potential.Add(item, item);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    List<T> intersection = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine    foreach (var item in second) {Di2015NewLine        if (potential.Remove(item)) {Di2015NewLine            intersection.Add(item);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return intersection;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
10835170Di2015UniqueSeparatorbool AreSameAsMultiSets(List<T> first, List<T> second) {Di2015NewLine    Dictionary<T, int> counts = new Dictionary<T, int>();     Di2015NewLine    foreach (var item in first) {Di2015NewLine        if (!counts.ContainsKey(item)) {Di2015NewLine            counts.Add(item, 0);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        counts[item] = counts[item] + 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    foreach (var item in second) {Di2015NewLine        if (!counts.ContainsKey(item)) {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        counts[item] = counts[item] - 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    foreach (var entry in counts) {Di2015NewLine        if (entry.Value != 0) {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10835959Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static IOrderedQueryable<T> ObjectSortRefactored<T>(this IQueryable<T> entities, Expression<Func<T, object>> expression, SortOrder order = SortOrder.Ascending)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var unaryExpression = expression.Body as UnaryExpression;Di2015NewLine        if (unaryExpression != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var propertyExpression = (MemberExpression)unaryExpression.Operand;Di2015NewLine            var parameters = expression.Parameters;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (propertyExpression.Type == typeof(DateTime))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var newExpression = Expression.Lambda<Func<T, DateTime>>(propertyExpression, parameters);Di2015NewLine                return order == SortOrder.Ascending ? entities.OrderBy(newExpression) : entities.OrderByDescending(newExpression);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (propertyExpression.Type == typeof(DateTime?))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var newExpression = Expression.Lambda<Func<T, DateTime?>>(propertyExpression, parameters);Di2015NewLine                return order == SortOrder.Ascending ? entities.OrderBy(newExpression) : entities.OrderByDescending(newExpression);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (propertyExpression.Type == typeof(int))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var newExpression = Expression.Lambda<Func<T, int>>(propertyExpression, parameters);Di2015NewLine                return order == SortOrder.Ascending ? entities.OrderBy(newExpression) : entities.OrderByDescending(newExpression);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (propertyExpression.Type == typeof(int?))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var newExpression = Expression.Lambda<Func<T, int?>>(propertyExpression, parameters);Di2015NewLine                return order == SortOrder.Ascending ? entities.OrderBy(newExpression) : entities.OrderByDescending(newExpression);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (propertyExpression.Type == typeof(bool))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var newExpression = Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(propertyExpression, parameters);Di2015NewLine                return order == SortOrder.Ascending ? entities.OrderBy(newExpression) : entities.OrderByDescending(newExpression);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            throw new NotSupportedException("Object type resolution not implemented for this type");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if(entities.GetType().IsAssignableFrom(typeof(IOrderedQueryable<T>)))Di2015NewLine                return order == SortOrder.Ascending ? (entities as IOrderedQueryable<T>).ThenBy(expression) : (entities as IOrderedQueryable<T>).ThenByDescending(expression);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return order == SortOrder.Ascending ? entities.OrderBy(expression) : entities.OrderByDescending(expression);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

10839557Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ThreadAwareStreamWriter : TextWriterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private ConcurrentDictionary<int, TextWriter> threadWriterMap;Di2015NewLine    private TextWriter defaultWriter;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ThreadAwareStreamWriter()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.threadWriterMap = new ConcurrentDictionary<int, TextWriter>();Di2015NewLine        this.defaultWriter = Console.Out;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TextWriter RegisterThreadWriter(TextWriter threadWriter)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int threadId = Thread.CurrentThread.ManagedThreadId;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        TextWriter oldWriter;Di2015NewLine        this.threadWriterMap.TryGetValue(threadId, out oldWriter);Di2015NewLine        this.threadWriterMap[threadId] = threadWriter;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return oldWriter;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void DeregisterThread()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TextWriter threadWriter;Di2015NewLine        if (this.threadWriterMap.TryRemove(Thread.CurrentThread.ManagedThreadId, out threadWriter))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            threadWriter.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override Encoding EncodingDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            TextWriter threadWriter;Di2015NewLine            if (this.threadWriterMap.TryGetValue(Thread.CurrentThread.ManagedThreadId, out threadWriter))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return threadWriter.Encoding;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return this.defaultWriter.Encoding;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void WriteLine(string value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TextWriter threadWriter;Di2015NewLine        if (this.threadWriterMap.TryGetValue(Thread.CurrentThread.ManagedThreadId, out threadWriter))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            threadWriter.WriteLine(value);Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (this.defaultWriter != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.defaultWriter.WriteLine(value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10840745Di2015UniqueSeparatorint[] GetPermutation(int size, int seed)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Random random = new Random(seed);Di2015NewLine    int[] array = new int[size];Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < size; i++)Di2015NewLine        array[i] = i;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = array.Length; i > 1; i--)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int j = random.Next(i);Di2015NewLine        int tmp = array[j];Di2015NewLine        array[j] = array[i - 1];Di2015NewLine        array[i - 1] = tmp;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return array;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineColor[] Encrypt(Color[] input, string password)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int seed = password.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine    int[] perm = GetPermutation(input.Length, seed);Di2015NewLine    Color[] encrypted = new Color[input.Length];Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < input.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        encrypted[perm[i]] = input[i];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return encrypted;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineColor[] Decrypt(Color[] input, string password)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int seed = password.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine    int[] perm = GetPermutation(input.Length, seed);Di2015NewLine    Color[] decrypted = new Color[input.Length];Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < input.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        decrypted[i] = input[perm[i]];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return decrypted;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
10840745Di2015UniqueSeparatorGetPermutation
10840745Di2015UniqueSeparatorEncrypt
10840745Di2015UniqueSeparatorDecrypt
10840745Di2015UniqueSeparatorColor[] array = new Color[5] { Color.Red, Color.Green, Color.Blue, Color.Yellow, Color.Black };Di2015NewLinestring password = "secret";Di2015NewLineColor[] enc = Encrypt(array, password); // will always return Blue, Green, Black, Yellow, Red for the "secret" passwordDi2015NewLineColor[] dec = Decrypt(enc, password); // will return the original array: Red, Green, Blue, Yellow, Black if given the "secret" passwordDi2015NewLineColor[] dec2 = Decrypt(enc, "incorrectpwd"); // will return Green, Blue, Yellow, Black, Red, which is incorrect because the password was incorrectDi2015NewLine
10840745Di2015UniqueSeparator.GetHashCode()
10840745Di2015UniqueSeparatorColor[] array = new Color[2] {Color.Red, Color.Green};Di2015NewLineColor[] enc = Encrypt(array, "one"); // will return Green, RedDi2015NewLineColor[] dec = Decrypt(enc, "one"); // will return Red, GreenDi2015NewLineColor[] dec2 = Decrypt(enc, "two"); // will also return Red, Green, even though the password was incorrectDi2015NewLine

10843493Di2015UniqueSeparatorbyte[] ToByteArray(newLeads value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Encoding encoding = new ASCIIEncoding(); //Choose some encodingDi2015NewLine    var stream = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine    EncodeString(value.id, stream, encoding);Di2015NewLine    EncodeString(value.first_name, stream, encoding);Di2015NewLine    EncodeString(value.last_name, stream, encoding);Di2015NewLine    int length = (int)stream.Length;Di2015NewLine    byte[] result = new byte[(int)stream.Length];Di2015NewLine    System.Buffer.BlockCopy(stream.GetBuffer(), 0, result, 0, length);Di2015NewLine    stream.Close();Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid EncodeString(string str, Stream stream, Encoding encoding)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Union union = new Union();Di2015NewLine    if (ReferenceEquals(str, null))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        union.data = -1;Di2015NewLine        stream.Write(new byte[]{union.a, union.b, union.c, union.c}, 0, 4);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        union.data = str.Length;Di2015NewLine        stream.Write(new byte[]{union.a, union.b, union.c, union.c}, 0, 4);Di2015NewLine        var tmp = encoding.GetBytes(str);Di2015NewLine        stream.Write(tmp, 0, tmp.Length);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10846331Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static List<Message> FetchAllMessages(string hostname, int port, bool useSsl, string username, string password)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // The client disconnects from the server when being disposedDi2015NewLine    using (Pop3Client client = new Pop3Client())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Connect to the serverDi2015NewLine        client.Connect(hostname, port, useSsl);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Authenticate ourselves towards the serverDi2015NewLine        client.Authenticate(username, password);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get the number of messages in the inboxDi2015NewLine        int messageCount = client.GetMessageCount();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // We want to download all messagesDi2015NewLine        List<Message> allMessages = new List<Message>(messageCount);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Messages are numbered in the interval: [1, messageCount]Di2015NewLine        // Ergo: message numbers are 1-based.Di2015NewLine        // Most servers give the latest message the highest numberDi2015NewLine        for (int i = messageCount; i > 0; i--)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            allMessages.Add(client.GetMessage(i));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Now return the fetched messagesDi2015NewLine        return allMessages;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10846632Di2015UniqueSeparator// this is basically the declaration of one overload of the Where methodDi2015NewLine// the this in the parameter declaration, indicates this is an extension method which will be available to all IEnumerable<> objectsDi2015NewLine// the Func<T, bool> is the interesting part, it is basically a delegate (as a reminder, the last parameter of the Func object indicates the type that must be returned, in this case is a bool)Di2015NewLine// the delegate is simply a pointer to a function Di2015NewLinepublic IEnumerable<T> Where<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source, Func<T, bool> predicate)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   ...some logicDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   ... yielding back the reusltsDi2015NewLine   foreach(var r in res)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      // here is the delegate in actionDi2015NewLine       if(predicate(r))Di2015NewLine           yield return r;Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10849299Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing Ionic.Zip;Di2015NewLineusing Ionic.Zlib;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ZipFileSize1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// This source code is generate the specified size Packages from the directory.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// The size of Package(100MB).Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public static long m_packageSize = 1024 * 1024 * 100;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        ///  Main method of program class.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="args">Command line argument</param>Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Enter Directory Full Name for Compression : ");Di2015NewLine            var dir = Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Zip File saved Location Directory Name : ");Di2015NewLine            var savedir = Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //generate the random zip files.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var zipFile = Path.Combine(savedir, DateTime.Now.Ticks + ".zip");Di2015NewLine            ZipFiles(dir, savedir);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// This method generate the package as per the <c>PackageSize</c> declare.Di2015NewLine        /// Currently <c>PackageSize</c> is 100MB.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="inputFolderPath">Input folder Path.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="outputFolderandFile">Output folder Path.</param>Di2015NewLine        public static void ZipFiles(string inputFolderPath, string outputFolderandFile)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ArrayList ar = GenerateFileList(inputFolderPath); // generate file listDi2015NewLine            int trimLength = (Directory.GetParent(inputFolderPath)).ToString().Length;Di2015NewLine            // find number of chars to remove   // from original file pathDi2015NewLine            trimLength += 1; //remove '\\'Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Output file stream of package.Di2015NewLine            FileStream ostream;Di2015NewLine            byte[] obuffer;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Output Zip file name.Di2015NewLine            string outPath = Path.Combine(outputFolderandFile, DateTime.Now.Ticks + ".zip");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ZipOutputStream oZipStream = new ZipOutputStream(File.Create(outPath), true); // create zip streamDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Compression level of zip file.Di2015NewLine            oZipStream.CompressionLevel = CompressionLevel.Default;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Initialize the zip entry object.Di2015NewLine            ZipEntry oZipEntry = new ZipEntry();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // numbers of files in file list.Di2015NewLine            var counter = ar.Count;Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                using (ZipFile zip = new ZipFile())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Array.Sort(ar.ToArray());  // Sort the file list array.Di2015NewLine                    foreach (string Fil in ar.ToArray()) // for each file, generate a zip entryDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        if (!Fil.EndsWith(@"/")) // if a file ends with '/' its a directoryDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            if (!zip.ContainsEntry(Path.GetFullPath(Fil.ToString())))Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                oZipEntry = zip.AddEntry(Path.GetFullPath(Fil.ToString()), Fil.Remove(0, trimLength));Di2015NewLine                                counter--;Di2015NewLine                                tryDi2015NewLine                                {Di2015NewLine                                    if (counter > 0)Di2015NewLine                                    {Di2015NewLine                                        if (oZipStream.Position < m_packageSize)Di2015NewLine                                        {Di2015NewLine                                            oZipStream.PutNextEntry(oZipEntry.FileName);Di2015NewLine                                            ostream = File.OpenRead(Fil);Di2015NewLine                                            obuffer = new byte[ostream.Length];Di2015NewLine                                            ostream.Read(obuffer, 0, obuffer.Length);Di2015NewLine                                            oZipStream.Write(obuffer, 0, obuffer.Length);Di2015NewLine                                        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                                        if (oZipStream.Position > m_packageSize)Di2015NewLine                                        {Di2015NewLine                                            zip.RemoveEntry(oZipEntry);Di2015NewLine                                            oZipStream.Flush();Di2015NewLine                                            oZipStream.Close(); // close the zip stream.Di2015NewLine                                            outPath = Path.Combine(outputFolderandFile, DateTime.Now.Ticks + ".zip"); // create new output zip file when package size.Di2015NewLine                                            oZipStream = new ZipOutputStream(File.Create(outPath), true); // create zip stream                                                Di2015NewLine                                        }Di2015NewLine                                    }Di2015NewLine                                    elseDi2015NewLine                                    {Di2015NewLine                                        Console.WriteLine("No more file existed in directory");Di2015NewLine                                    }Di2015NewLine                                }Di2015NewLine                                catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine                                {Di2015NewLine                                    Console.WriteLine(ex.Message);Di2015NewLine                                    zip.RemoveEntry(oZipEntry.FileName);Di2015NewLine                                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                            elseDi2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                Console.WriteLine("File Existed {0} in Zip {1}", Path.GetFullPath(Fil.ToString()), outPath);Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(ex.Message);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                oZipStream.Flush();Di2015NewLine                oZipStream.Close();// close streamDi2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Remain Files{0}", counter);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// This method return the list of files from the directoryDi2015NewLine        /// Also read the child directory also, but not add the 0 length file.Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="Dir">Name of directory.</param>Di2015NewLine        /// <returns>return the list of all files including into subdirectory files </returns>Di2015NewLine        private static ArrayList GenerateFileList(string Dir)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ArrayList fils = new ArrayList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (string file in Directory.GetFiles(Dir, "*.*", SearchOption.AllDirectories)) // add each file in directoryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (File.ReadAllBytes(file).Length > 0)Di2015NewLine                    fils.Add(file);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return fils; // return file listDi2015NewLine        }      Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10852671Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Net.Sockets;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace LolBotDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    internal struct IRCConfigDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public string server;Di2015NewLine        public int port;Di2015NewLine        public string nick;Di2015NewLine        public string name;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal class IRCBot : IDisposableDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private TcpClient IRCConnection = null;Di2015NewLine        private IRCConfig config;Di2015NewLine        private NetworkStream ns = null;Di2015NewLine        private StreamReader sr = null;Di2015NewLine        private StreamWriter sw = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public IRCBot(IRCConfig config)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.config = config;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Connect()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                IRCConnection = new TcpClient(config.server, config.port);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catchDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Connection Error");Di2015NewLine                throw;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ns = IRCConnection.GetStream();Di2015NewLine                sr = new StreamReader(ns);Di2015NewLine                sw = new StreamWriter(ns);Di2015NewLine                sendData("USER", config.nick + config.name);Di2015NewLine                sendData("NICK", config.nick);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catchDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Communication error");Di2015NewLine                throw;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void sendData(string cmd, string param)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (param == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sw.WriteLine(cmd);Di2015NewLine                sw.Flush();Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(cmd);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sw.WriteLine(cmd + " " + param);Di2015NewLine                sw.Flush();Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(cmd + " " + param);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void IRCWork()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string[] ex;Di2015NewLine            string data;Di2015NewLine            bool shouldRun = true;Di2015NewLine            while (shouldRun)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                data = sr.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(data);Di2015NewLine                char[] charSeparator = new char[] {' '};Di2015NewLine                ex = data.Split(charSeparator, 5);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (ex[0] == "PING")Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    sendData("PONG", ex[1]);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (ex.Length > 4) //is the command received long enough to be a bot command?Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    string command = ex[3]; //grab the command sentDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    switch (command)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        case ":!join":Di2015NewLine                            sendData("JOIN", ex[4]);Di2015NewLine                                //if the command is !join send the "JOIN" command to the server with the parameters set by the userDi2015NewLine                            break;Di2015NewLine                        case ":!say":Di2015NewLine                            sendData("PRIVMSG", ex[2] + " " + ex[4]);Di2015NewLine                                //if the command is !say, send a message to the chan (ex[2]) followed by the actual message (ex[4]).Di2015NewLine                            break;Di2015NewLine                        case ":!quit":Di2015NewLine                            sendData("QUIT", ex[4]);Di2015NewLine                                //if the command is quit, send the QUIT command to the server with a quit messageDi2015NewLine                            shouldRun = false;Di2015NewLine                                //turn shouldRun to false - the server will stop sending us data so trying to read it will not work and result in an error. This stops the loop from running and we will close off the connections properlyDi2015NewLine                            break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (sr != null)Di2015NewLine                sr.Close();Di2015NewLine            if (sw != null)Di2015NewLine                sw.Close();Di2015NewLine            if (ns != null)Di2015NewLine                ns.Close();Di2015NewLine            if (IRCConnection != null)Di2015NewLine                IRCConnection.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            IRCConfig conf = new IRCConfig();Di2015NewLine            conf.name = "LolBot";Di2015NewLine            conf.nick = "LolBot";Di2015NewLine            conf.port = 6667;Di2015NewLine            conf.server = "irc.strictfp.com";Di2015NewLine            using (var bot = new IRCBot(conf))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                bot.Connect();Di2015NewLine                bot.IRCWork();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Bot quit/crashed");Di2015NewLine            Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10855686Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing Raven.Client.Document;Di2015NewLineusing Raven.Client.Indexes;Di2015NewLineusing Raven.Client.Linq;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ConsoleApplication1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  public class TickDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    public string Id { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public DateTime Time { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public decimal Bid { get; set; }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  /// <summary>Di2015NewLine  /// This index is a true map/reduce, but its totals are for all time.Di2015NewLine  /// You can't filter it by time range.Di2015NewLine  /// </summary>Di2015NewLine  class Ticks_Aggregate : AbstractIndexCreationTask<Tick, Ticks_Aggregate.Result>Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    public class ResultDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      public decimal Min { get; set; }Di2015NewLine      public decimal Max { get; set; }Di2015NewLine      public int Count { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Ticks_Aggregate()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      Map = ticks => from tick in ticksDi2015NewLine               select newDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                      Min = tick.Bid,Di2015NewLine                      Max = tick.Bid,Di2015NewLine                      Count = 1Di2015NewLine                    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      Reduce = results => from result in resultsDi2015NewLine                group result by 0Di2015NewLine                  into gDi2015NewLine                  select newDi2015NewLine                         {Di2015NewLine                           Min = g.Min(x => x.Min),Di2015NewLine                           Max = g.Max(x => x.Max),Di2015NewLine                           Count = g.Sum(x => x.Count)Di2015NewLine                         };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  /// <summary>Di2015NewLine  /// This index can be filtered by time range, but it does not reduce anythingDi2015NewLine  /// so it will not be performant if there are many items inside the filter.Di2015NewLine  /// </summary>Di2015NewLine  class Ticks_ByTime : AbstractIndexCreationTask<Tick>Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    public class ResultDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      public decimal Min { get; set; }Di2015NewLine      public decimal Max { get; set; }Di2015NewLine      public int Count { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Ticks_ByTime()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      Map = ticks => from tick in ticksDi2015NewLine               select new {tick.Time};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      TransformResults = (database, ticks) =>Di2015NewLine                 from tick in ticksDi2015NewLine                 group tick by 0Di2015NewLine                 into gDi2015NewLine                 select newDi2015NewLine                      {Di2015NewLine                        Min = g.Min(x => x.Bid),Di2015NewLine                        Max = g.Max(x => x.Bid),Di2015NewLine                        Count = g.Count()Di2015NewLine                      };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  class ProgramDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    private static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      var documentStore = new DocumentStore { Url = "http://localhost:8080" };Di2015NewLine      documentStore.Initialize();Di2015NewLine      IndexCreation.CreateIndexes(typeof(Program).Assembly, documentStore);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      var today = DateTime.Today;Di2015NewLine      var rnd = new Random();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      using (var session = documentStore.OpenSession())Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        // Generate 100 random ticksDi2015NewLine        for (var i = 0; i < 100; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          var tick = new Tick { Time = today.AddMinutes(i), Bid = rnd.Next(100, 1000) / 100m };Di2015NewLine          session.Store(tick);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        session.SaveChanges();Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      using (var session = documentStore.OpenSession())Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        // Query items with a filter.  This will create a dynamic index.Di2015NewLine        var fromTime = today.AddMinutes(20);Di2015NewLine        var toTime = today.AddMinutes(80);Di2015NewLine        var ticks = session.Query<Tick>()Di2015NewLine          .Where(x => x.Time >= fromTime && x.Time <= toTime)Di2015NewLine          .OrderBy(x => x.Time);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Ouput the results of the above queryDi2015NewLine        foreach (var tick in ticks)Di2015NewLine          Console.WriteLine("{0} {1}", tick.Time, tick.Bid);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get the aggregates for all timeDi2015NewLine        var total = session.Query<Tick, Ticks_Aggregate>()Di2015NewLine          .As<Ticks_Aggregate.Result>()Di2015NewLine          .Single();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Totals");Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Min: {0}", total.Min);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Max: {0}", total.Max);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Count: {0}", total.Count);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get the aggregates with a filterDi2015NewLine        var filtered = session.Query<Tick, Ticks_ByTime>()Di2015NewLine          .Where(x => x.Time >= fromTime && x.Time <= toTime)Di2015NewLine          .As<Ticks_ByTime.Result>()Di2015NewLine          .Take(1024)  // max you can take at onceDi2015NewLine          .ToList()    // required!Di2015NewLine          .Single();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Filtered");Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Min: {0}", filtered.Min);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Max: {0}", filtered.Max);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Count: {0}", filtered.Count);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

        //This will cause problems if the value is both nullDi2015NewLine            if (param.Direction == ParameterDirection.InputOutput )Di2015NewLine                param.Direction = ParameterDirection.Output;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        cmd.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Printparams(cmd.Parameters ,"Executed");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        cmd.Parameters["@tenVC"].DbType = DbType.String;Di2015NewLine        cmd.Parameters["@tenNVC"].DbType = change");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (SqlParameter param in cmd.Parameters)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (param.DbType != DbType.Int32Di2015NewLine                && param.DbType != DbType.GuidDi2015NewLine                && param.Size != -1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                param.Size = param.Size * 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        cmd.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Printparams(cmd.Parameters, "Mangeled sizes up");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (SqlParameter param in cmd.Parameters)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (param.DbType != DbType.Int32 Di2015NewLine                && param.DbType != DbType.GuidDi2015NewLine                && param.Size != -1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                param.Size = param.Size / 4;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        cmd.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Printparams(cmd.Parameters, "Mangeled sizes down");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        cmd.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Printparams(cmd.Parameters, "is negative one magic");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine a.Length); Di2015NewLine   System.Buffer.BlockCopy(b, 0, c, a.Length, b.Length); Di2015NewLine   return c; Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprotected void Button1_Click(object 10866515Di2015UniqueSeparator<?PHPDi2015NewLine  function getFileList($dir)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    // array to hold return valueDi2015NewLine    $retval = array();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // add trailing slash if missingDi2015NewLine    if(substr($dir, -1) != "/") $dir .= "/";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // open pointer to directory and read list of filesDi2015NewLine    $d = @dir($dir) or die("getFileList: Failed opening directory $dir for reading");Di2015NewLine    while(false !== ($entry = $d->read())) {Di2015NewLine      // skip hidden filesDi2015NewLine      if($entry[0] == ".") continue;Di2015NewLine      if(is_dir("$dir$entry")) {Di2015NewLine        $retval[] = array(Di2015NewLine          "name" => "$dir$entry/",Di2015NewLine          "type" => filetype("$dir$entry"),Di2015NewLine          "size" => 0,Di2015NewLine          "lastmod" => filemtime("$dir$entry")Di2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLine      } elseif(is_readable("$dir$entry")) {Di2015NewLine       $retval[] = array(Di2015NewLine          "name" => "$dir$entry",Di2015NewLine          "type" => mime_content_type("$dir$entry"),Di2015NewLine          "size" => filesize("$dir$entry"),Di2015NewLine          "lastmod" => filemtime("$dir$entry")Di2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine    $d->close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return $retval;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine?>Di2015NewLine

10866972Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static List<int> IntersectSorted(this int[] source, int[] target)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Set initial capacity to a "full-intersection" sizeDi2015NewLine    // This prevents multiple re-allocationsDi2015NewLine    var ints = new List<int>(Math.Min(source.Length, target.Length));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var i = 0;Di2015NewLine    var j = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (i < source.Length && j < target.Length)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Compare only once and let compiler optimize the switch-caseDi2015NewLine        switch (source[i].CompareTo(target[j]))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case -1:Di2015NewLine                i++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Saves us a JMP instructionDi2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLine            case 1:Di2015NewLine                j++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Saves us a JMP instructionDi2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                ints.Add(source[i++]);Di2015NewLine                j++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Saves us a JMP instructionDi2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Free unused memory (sets capacity to actual count)Di2015NewLine    ints.TrimExcess();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return ints;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
10866972Di2015UniqueSeparatorints.TrimExcess();
10866972Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<int> IntersectSorted(this int[] source, int[] target)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var i = 0;Di2015NewLine    var j = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (i < source.Length && j < target.Length)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Compare only once and let compiler optimize the switch-caseDi2015NewLine        switch (source[i].CompareTo(target[j]))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case -1:Di2015NewLine                i++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Saves us a JMP instructionDi2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLine            case 1:Di2015NewLine                j++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Saves us a JMP instructionDi2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                yield return source[i++];Di2015NewLine                j++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Saves us a JMP instructionDi2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
10866972Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static unsafe List<int> IntersectSorted(this int[] source, int[] target)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var ints = new List<int>(Math.Min(source.Length, target.Length));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    fixed (int* ptSrc = source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var maxSrcAdr = ptSrc + source.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        fixed (int* ptTar = target)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var maxTarAdr = ptTar + source.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var currSrc = ptSrc;Di2015NewLine            var currTar = ptTar;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while (currSrc < maxSrcAdr && currTar < maxTarAdr)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                switch ((*currSrc).CompareTo(*currTar))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    case -1:Di2015NewLine                        currSrc++;Di2015NewLine                        continue;Di2015NewLine                    case 1:Di2015NewLine                        currTar++;Di2015NewLine                        continue;Di2015NewLine                    default:Di2015NewLine                        ints.Add(*currSrc);Di2015NewLine                        currSrc++;Di2015NewLine                        currTar++;Di2015NewLine                        continue;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ints.TrimExcess();Di2015NewLine    return ints;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10867026Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine  /// when this method called, it sets visible = false the columns where not in List of column namesDi2015NewLine  /// The column names List count and header List count must be the same numberDi2015NewLine  /// </summary>Di2015NewLine  /// <param name="dgvName">DGV which calls this ext method</param>Di2015NewLine  /// <param name="Method">the data source load method of the DGV which calls this ext method</param>Di2015NewLine  /// <param name="ColumnName">The columnNames List which contains the columns will show.. columnName List's type is List<string></param>Di2015NewLine  /// <param name="Header">The list where you can set the dgv's headers as you prefer..it's type is also List<string></param>Di2015NewLine  /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine  public static DataGridView showTheGivenColumns(this DataGridView dgvName, object dataSourceLoadMethod, List<string> columnNameList, List<string> headerList)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                dgvName.DataSource = null;Di2015NewLine                dgvName.Columns.Clear();Di2015NewLine                dgvName.DataSource = dataSourceLoadMethod;Di2015NewLine                int j = columnNameList.Count;Di2015NewLine                int m = 0;Di2015NewLine                int s = headerList.Count;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (j == s)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    foreach (DataGridViewColumn d in dgvName.Columns)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        for (int i = 0; 10867026Di2015UniqueSeparatorbool vscroll = (dgvName.DisplayedRowCount(false) < dgvName.Rows.Count);Di2015NewLine                bool hscroll = (dgvName.DisplayedColumnCount(false) < columnNameList.Count);Di2015NewLine                if (vscroll == true)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    int vScrollWidth = (dgvName.Controls.OfType<VScrollBar>().First()).Width;Di2015NewLine                    dgvName.Width = m + (vScrollWidth + 5);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if ( vscroll == false)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    dgvName.Width = m + 5;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (hscroll == true)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    int hscrollWidth = (dgvName.Controls.OfType<HScrollBar>().First()).Height;Di2015NewLine                    dgvName.Height = ((dgvName.RowTemplate.Height * dgvName.RowCount) + dgvName.ColumnHeadersHeight) + hscrollWidth;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (hscroll == false)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    dgvName.Height = ((dgvName.RowTemplate.Height * dgvName.RowCount) + dgvName.ColumnHeadersHeight) + 2;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                dgvName.ClearSelection();Di2015NewLine                dgvName.ReadOnly = true;Di2015NewLine                return dgvName;Di2015NewLine             }Di2015NewLine

10869223Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate float worldRotation = 0;Di2015NewLinepublic void RevolveAroundFocusPoint(float relativeDegrees)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    worldRotation += MathHelper.ToRadians(relativeDegrees);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic Vector3 ModifiedDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    getDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Vector3 f = Vector3.Transform(Focus, Matrix.Invert(Matrix.CreateRotationY(worldRotation)));Di2015NewLine        return new Vector3(f.X, Position.Y, f.Z);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic float Multiplier(float value, Vector3 v3)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return value / /*Zoom / */ (Math.Abs(v3.X) + Math.Abs(v3.Z));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic void MoveRight(float value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Vector3 f = Modified;Di2015NewLine    float multiplier = Multiplier(value, f);Di2015NewLine    Position += new Vector3(f.Z * multiplier, 0, f.X * multiplier);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic void MoveLeft(float value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Vector3 f = Modified;Di2015NewLine    float multiplier = Multiplier(value, f);Di2015NewLine    Position += new Vector3(-f.Z * multiplier, 0, -f.X * multiplier);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic void MoveBackward(float value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Vector3 f = Modified;Di2015NewLine    float multiplier = Multiplier(value, f);Di2015NewLine    Position += new Vector3(-f.X * multiplier, 0, f.Z * multiplier);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic void MoveForward(float value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Vector3 f = Modified;Di2015NewLine    float multiplier = Multiplier(value, f);Di2015NewLine    Position += new Vector3(f.X * multiplier, 0, -f.Z * multiplier);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic Matrix World;Di2015NewLinepublic Matrix View;Di2015NewLinepublic Matrix Proj;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic Vector3 Position { get; private set; }Di2015NewLinepublic Vector3 Focus;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void Update()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    World = Matrix.CreateTranslation(-Position - Focus) *Di2015NewLine        Matrix.Invert(Matrix.CreateRotationY(worldRotation)) *Di2015NewLine        Matrix.CreateScale(Zoom) *Di2015NewLine        Matrix.CreateTranslation(Position + Focus);Di2015NewLine    View = Matrix.CreateLookAt(Position, Position + Focus, Vector3.Up);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10878628Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static void PrintItems(List<CategoryItem> items)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Dictionary<string, List<CategoryItem>> dictOfChildren = new Dictionary<string, List<CategoryItem>>();Di2015NewLine        // loop through all the items grouping them according to their ParentIDDi2015NewLine        foreach (CategoryItem anItem in items)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            List<CategoryItem> children;Di2015NewLine            if (!dictOfChildren.TryGetValue(anItem.ParentID, out children))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                children = new List<CategoryItem>();Di2015NewLine                dictOfChildren[anItem.ParentID] = children;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            children.Add(anItem);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // recursively print all the items starting from the ones with ParentID = 0Di2015NewLine        // the dictionary is passed to the method in order to be able to find the children of each itemDi2015NewLine        PrintItems(dictOfChildren["0"], dictOfChildren, 0);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void PrintItems(List<CategoryItem> list, Dictionary<string, List<CategoryItem>> dictOfChildren, int levelOfIndentation)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (CategoryItem anItem in list)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // first print the current itemDi2015NewLine            anItem.Print(levelOfIndentation);Di2015NewLine            // then recursively print all its childrenDi2015NewLine            List<CategoryItem> children;Di2015NewLine            if (dictOfChildren.TryGetValue(anItem.CategoryID, out children) &&Di2015NewLine                children.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine                PrintItems(children, dictOfChildren, levelOfIndentation + 1);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
10878628Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void PrintItems(List<CategoryItem> items)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // call a recursive method passing 0 as level of indentationDi2015NewLine    PrintItems(items, 0);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static void PrintItems(List<CategoryItem> items, int levelOfIndentation)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    foreach (CategoryItem anItem in items)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // print the currentItemDi2015NewLine        anItem.Print(levelOfIndentation);Di2015NewLine        // increment the level of indentation and callk the same method for the childrenDi2015NewLine        PrintItems(anItem.SubCategory, levelOfIndentation + 1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
10878658Di2015UniqueSeparatorDataTable dtCloned = dt.Clone();Di2015NewLinedtCloned.Columns[0].DataType = typeof(Decimal);Di2015NewLineforeach (DataRow row in dt.Rows) Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    dtCloned.ImportRow(row);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10887046Di2015UniqueSeparator//I have loaded a TimeSchedule object by id Di2015NewLineTimeZoneInfo tzi = TimeZoneInfo.FindSystemTimeZoneById(schedule.LocationId); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Get the UTC time Di2015NewLineDateTime utcNow = DateTime.UtcNow; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//I then apply the location offset hour to the server utc time. Di2015NewLineDateTime currentUtcTime = DateTime.UtcNow; Di2015NewLineDateTime locationTime = TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTimeFromUtc(currentUtcTime, tzi);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Get the day of the week from our locationTime that we off setted from UTC Di2015NewLinestring locationWeekDay = locationTime.DayOfWeek.ToString(); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Now for each case of week day, I check to see if the difference in time is >= 0 Di2015NewLine// If so I assume the store is open Di2015NewLineTimeSpan zeroDifference = new TimeSpan(0, 0, 0); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// This switch case just gets the difference in time according to LocationTime (that we offset'd from UTC) and stored time for the location on the server. Di2015NewLine// Then verifies that the location is open for that day   Di2015NewLineswitch (locationWeekDay) Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine     case "Sunday":  Di2015NewLine          // Verify that location is open, turn on open sign  Di2015NewLine          TimeSpan differenceOpenTimeSun = currentUtcTime.TimeOfDay - schedule.sundayOpen;  Di2015NewLine          TimeSpan differenceCloseTimeSun = schedule.sundayClose - currentUtcTime.TimeOfDay;  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine          if (differenceOpenTimeSun >= zeroDifference && differenceCloseTimeSun > zeroDifference)  Di2015NewLine           {  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine           imgSign.ImageUrl = "~/SiteImages/open.jpg";  Di2015NewLine        }  Di2015NewLine        else  Di2015NewLine        {  Di2015NewLine           imgSign.ImageUrl = "~/SiteImages/closed.jpg";  Di2015NewLine        }  Di2015NewLine        break;  Di2015NewLine
10887079Di2015UniqueSeparator  public partial class _Default : System.Web.UI.PageDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    protected void Page_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Form.Controls.Add(AddToList()); Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   public static HtmlGenericControl AddToList()      Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine       HtmlGenericControl menu = new HtmlGenericControl("ul");Di2015NewLine       DataTable table = GetMenus();Di2015NewLine       //NOTE  i initialized this to 7, because this is the max rows id, andDi2015NewLine       // im basing my builder on indexes to work. This can be easily replaced toDi2015NewLine       // a dictionary<int,HtmlGenericControl> or any othre suitable collectionDi2015NewLine       HtmlGenericControl[] arrayOfLists = new HtmlGenericControl[7];Di2015NewLine       foreach (DataRow row in table.Rows)Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine          //assume control has no children, unless proved otherwiseDi2015NewLine           HtmlGenericControl temp  = new HtmlGenericControl("li");Di2015NewLine           //add the control to its indexes place in the array and init itDi2015NewLine           arrayOfLists[(int)row["id"] - 1] = temp;Di2015NewLine           HtmlAnchor link = new HtmlAnchor();Di2015NewLine           link.HRef = row["url"].ToString();Di2015NewLine           link.InnerText = row["menuname"].ToString();Di2015NewLine           temp.Controls.Add(link);Di2015NewLine           int? parentId = string.IsNullOrEmpty(row["parentmenuId"].ToString()) ? null : (int?)int.Parse(row["parentmenuId"].ToString());Di2015NewLine           if (parentId.HasValue)Di2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine               // if a control has a parent - make its parent a ul insead of liDi2015NewLine              // and add it to the parents collectionDi2015NewLine               arrayOfLists[parentId.Value - 1].TagName = "ul";Di2015NewLine               arrayOfLists[parentId.Value - 1].Controls.Add(arrayOfLists[(int)row["id"] - 1]);Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLine           elseDi2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine                // no parent = add to the first created ul menuDi2015NewLine               menu.Controls.Add(temp);Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       return menu;     Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   public static DataTable GetMenus()Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine       DataTable dt = new DataTable ();Di2015NewLine       dt.Columns.Add("id", typeof(int));Di2015NewLine       dt.Columns.Add("menuname", typeof(string));Di2015NewLine       dt.Columns.Add("url", typeof(string));Di2015NewLine       dt.Columns.Add("parentmenuId", typeof(string));Di2015NewLine       dt.Rows.Add(1,"Home","~/Home.aspx",        null  );Di2015NewLine       dt.Rows.Add( 2,"Product","~/products.aspx",    null);Di2015NewLine       dt.Rows.Add(3,"services", "~/services.aspx",null);Di2015NewLine       dt.Rows.Add(4, "ERP",  "~/erp.aspx",           "2" );Di2015NewLine       dt.Rows.Add( 5  ,"HRM" ,"~/hrm.aspx",           "4" );Di2015NewLine       dt.Rows.Add(7, " Payroll", "~/payroll.aspx", "4");Di2015NewLine       return dt;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine

10890964Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void AddPath(string path)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   char[] charSeparators = new char[] {'\\\\'};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // Parse into a sequence of parts.Di2015NewLine   string[] parts = path.Split(charSeparators, Di2015NewLine       StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // The current node.  Start with this.Di2015NewLine   Node current = this;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   // Iterate through the parts.Di2015NewLine   foreach (string part in parts)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine       // The child node.Di2015NewLine       Node child;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine       // Does the part exist in the current node? 10892587Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static byte[] ReadFully(Stream input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] buffer = new byte[16 * 1024];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    input.Position = 0; // Add this line to set the input stream position to 0Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int read;Di2015NewLine        while ((read = input.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length)) > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ms.Write(buffer, 0, read);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return ms.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine

10893681Di2015UniqueSeparatorCREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[getcust]Di2015NewLine    @PageIndex INT, Di2015NewLine    @PageSize INT,Di2015NewLine    @Searchkey VARCHAR(255),Di2015NewLine    @TotalRecords int OUTPUTDi2015NewLine  ASDi2015NewLineIF EXISTS(SELECT * FROM tbcustomer  WHERE cust_firstname= @Searchkey)Di2015NewLineBEGINDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  SELECT @TotalRecords =count(*)  FROM tbcustomer WHERE cust_firstname= @Searchkey;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  WITH customer AS ( Di2015NewLine    SELECT  ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY cust_firstname ASC) AS Row, Di2015NewLine        cust_id, cust_firstname,address,phone Di2015NewLine    FROM tbcustomer WHERE cust_firstname= @searchkeyDi2015NewLine  )Di2015NewLine  SELECT cust_id,cust_firstname,address,phone FROM customer Di2015NewLine  WHERE Row between (@PageIndex - 1) * @PageSize + 1 and @PageIndex*@PageSizeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineENDDi2015NewLine

10895084Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void VaryQualityLevel()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine// Get a bitmap.Di2015NewLineBitmap bmp1 = new Bitmap(@"c:\\TestPhoto.jpg");Di2015NewLineImageCodecInfo jgpEncoder = GetEncoder(ImageFormat.Jpeg);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Create an Encoder object based on the GUIDDi2015NewLine// for the Quality parameter category.Di2015NewLineSystem.Drawing.Imaging.Encoder myEncoder =Di2015NewLine    System.Drawing.Imaging.Encoder.Quality;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Create an EncoderParameters object.Di2015NewLine// An EncoderParameters object has an array of EncoderParameterDi2015NewLine// objects. In this case, there is only oneDi2015NewLine// EncoderParameter object in the array.Di2015NewLineEncoderParameters myEncoderParameters = new EncoderParameters(1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineEncoderParameter myEncoderParameter = new EncoderParameter(myEncoder, Di2015NewLine    50L);Di2015NewLinemyEncoderParameters.Param[0] = myEncoderParameter;Di2015NewLinebmp1.Save(@"c:\\TestPhotoQualityFifty.jpg", jgpEncoder, Di2015NewLine    myEncoderParameters);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinemyEncoderParameter = new EncoderParameter(myEncoder, 100L);Di2015NewLinemyEncoderParameters.Param[0] = myEncoderParameter;Di2015NewLinebmp1.Save(@"c:\\TestPhotoQualityHundred.jpg", jgpEncoder, Di2015NewLine    myEncoderParameters);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Save the bitmap as a JPG file with zero quality level compression.Di2015NewLinemyEncoderParameter = new EncoderParameter(myEncoder, 0L);Di2015NewLinemyEncoderParameters.Param[0] = myEncoderParameter;Di2015NewLinebmp1.Save(@"c:\\TestPhotoQualityZero.jpg", jgpEncoder, Di2015NewLine    myEncoderParameters);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate ImageCodecInfo GetEncoder(ImageFormat format)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ImageCodecInfo[] codecs = ImageCodecInfo.GetImageDecoders();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (ImageCodecInfo codec in codecs)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (codec.FormatID == format.Guid)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return codec;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10896311Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void DataTableToFile(string fileLoc, DataTable dt)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder str = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // get the column headersDi2015NewLine    str.Append(String.Join(",", dt.Columns.Cast<DataColumn>()Di2015NewLine                                      .Select(col => col.ColumnName)) + "\\r\\n");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // write the data hereDi2015NewLine    dt.Rows.Cast<DataRow>().ToList()Di2015NewLine           .ForEach(row => str.Append(string.Join(",", row.ItemArray) + "\\r\\n"));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Write(fileLoc, str.ToString());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //ToDO:Add error loggingDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10897310Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq.Expressions;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class PredicateBuilderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  public static Expression<Func<T, bool>> True<T> ()  { return f => true;  }Di2015NewLine  public static Expression<Func<T, bool>> False<T> () { return f => false; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public static Expression<Func<T, bool>> Or<T> (this Expression<Func<T, bool>> expr1,Di2015NewLine                                                      Expression<Func<T, bool>> expr2)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    var invokedExpr = Expression.Invoke (expr2, expr1.Parameters.Cast<Expression> ());Di2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>Di2015NewLine          (Expression.OrElse (expr1.Body, invokedExpr), expr1.Parameters);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public static Expression<Func<T, bool>> And<T> (this Expression<Func<T, bool>> expr1,Di2015NewLine                                                       Expression<Func<T, bool>> expr2)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    var invokedExpr = Expression.Invoke (expr2, expr1.Parameters.Cast<Expression> ());Di2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>Di2015NewLine          (Expression.AndAlso (expr1.Body, invokedExpr), expr1.Parameters);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10897607Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class TraceAspectProvider : IAspectProvider {Di2015NewLine    readonly SomeTracingAspect aspectToApply = new SomeTracingAspect();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IEnumerable<AspectInstance> ProvideAspects(object targetElement) {Di2015NewLine        Assembly assembly = (Assembly)targetElement;Di2015NewLine        List<AspectInstance> instances = new List<AspectInstance>();Di2015NewLine        foreach (Type type in assembly.GetTypes()) {Di2015NewLine            ProcessType(type, instances);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return instances;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    void ProcessType(Type type, List<AspectInstance> instances) {Di2015NewLine        foreach (MethodInfo targetMethod in type.GetMethods(BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.DeclaredOnly)) {Di2015NewLine            instances.Add(new AspectInstance(targetMethod, aspectToApply));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        foreach (Type nestedType in type.GetNestedTypes()) {Di2015NewLine            ProcessType(nestedType, instances);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10898687Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static DateTime getNextWeekDaysDate(String englWeekDate)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var desired = (DayOfWeek)Enum.Parse(typeof(DayOfWeek), englWeekDate);Di2015NewLine    var current = DateTime.Today.DayOfWeek;Di2015NewLine    int c = (int)current;Di2015NewLine    int d = (int)desired;Di2015NewLine    int n = (7 - c + d);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return DateTime.Today.AddDays((n >= 7) ? n % 7 : n);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
