10899202Di2015UniqueSeparatorExpression<Func<T,bool>> Combine<T,TNav>(Expression<Func<T,TNav>> parent, Expression<Func<TNav,bool>> nav)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine     var param = Expression.Parameter(typeof(T), "x");Di2015NewLine     var visitor = new ReplacementVisitor(parent.Parameters[0], param);Di2015NewLine     var newParentBody = visitor.Visit(parent.Body);Di2015NewLine     visitor = new ReplacementVisitor(nav.Parameters[0], newParentBody);Di2015NewLine     var body = visitor.Visit(nav.Body);Di2015NewLine     return Expression.Lambda<Func<T, bool>>(body, param);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ReplacementVisitor : System.Linq.Expressions.ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly Expression _oldExpr;Di2015NewLine    private readonly Expression _newExpr;Di2015NewLine    public ReplacementVisitor(Expression oldExpr, Expression newExpr)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _oldExpr = oldExpr;Di2015NewLine        _newExpr = newExpr;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override Expression Visit(Expression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (node == _oldExpr)Di2015NewLine            return _newExpr;Di2015NewLine        return base.Visit(node);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10902173Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string PropertyName<T>(this Expression<Func<T, object>> propertyExpression)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine        MemberExpression mbody = propertyExpression.Body as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (mbody == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //This will handle Nullable<T> properties.Di2015NewLine            UnaryExpression ubody = propertyExpression.Body as UnaryExpression;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (ubody != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                mbody = ubody.Operand as MemberExpression;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (mbody == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentException("Expression is not a MemberExpression", "propertyExpression");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return mbody.Member.Name;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10903124Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class UriConverter : JsonConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public override bool CanConvert(Type objectType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override object ReadJson(JsonReader reader, Type objectType, object existingValue, JsonSerializer serializer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (reader.TokenType == JsonToken.String)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //try to create uri out of the stringDi2015NewLine            Uri uri;Di2015NewLine            if(Uri.TryCreate(reader.Value.ToString(), UriKind.Absolute, out uri))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return uri;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            //just a string -> return string valueDi2015NewLine            return reader.Value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (reader.TokenType == JsonToken.Null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        throw new InvalidOperationException("Unable to process JSON");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void WriteJson(JsonWriter writer, object value, JsonSerializer serializer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (null == value)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            writer.WriteNull();Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (value is Uri)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            writer.WriteValue(((Uri)value).OriginalString);Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        throw new InvalidOperationException("Unable to process JSON");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
10903124Di2015UniqueSeparator [JsonConverter(typeof(UriConverter))]Di2015NewLine public object Obj {get;set;}Di2015NewLine

10905003Di2015UniqueSeparatorMatch a single character present in the list below [\\p{Lu}\\p{M}\\p{Z}\\p{N}\\p{P}\\p{S}]*Di2015NewLine   Between zero and unlimited times, as many times as possible, giving back as needed (greedy) *Di2015NewLine   A character with the Unicode property uppercase letter? (an uppercase letter that has a lowercase variant) \\p{Lu}Di2015NewLine   A character with the Unicode property mark? (a character intended to be combined with another character (e.g. accents, umlauts, enclosing boxes, etc.)) \\p{M}Di2015NewLine   A character with the Unicode property separator? (any kind of whitespace or invisible separator) \\p{Z}Di2015NewLine   A character with the Unicode property number? (any kind of numeric character in any script) \\p{N}Di2015NewLine   A character with the Unicode property punctuation? (any kind of punctuation character) \\p{P}Di2015NewLine   A character with the Unicode property symbol? (math symbols, currency signs, dingbats, box-drawing characters, etc.) \\p{S}Di2015NewLineAssert position at a word boundary \\bDi2015NewLine

column.ColumnName, ") = '')");Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (column.DataType.Equals(typeof(DateTime)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine 10909257Di2015UniqueSeparator  public bool IsProcessOpen(string name)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine //here we're going to get a list of all running processes onDi2015NewLine //the computerDi2015NewLine foreach (Process clsProcess in Process.GetProcesses()) {Di2015NewLine    //now we're going to see if any of the running processesDi2015NewLine    //match the currently running processes. Be sure to notDi2015NewLine    //add the .exe to the name you provide, i.e: NOTEPAD,Di2015NewLine    //not NOTEPAD.EXE or false is always returned even ifDi2015NewLine    //notepad is running.Di2015NewLine    //Remember, if you have the process running more than once, Di2015NewLine    //say IE open 4 times the loop thr way it is now will close all 4,Di2015NewLine    //if you want it to just close the first one it findsDi2015NewLine    //then add a return; after the KillDi2015NewLine    if (clsProcess.ProcessName.Contains(name))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //if the process is found to be running then weDi2015NewLine        //return a trueDi2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine//otherwise we return a falseDi2015NewLinereturn false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10910168Di2015UniqueSeparator--Use OPENXML to pull records from an XML string and insert them into a databaseDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDECLARE @idoc intDi2015NewLineDECLARE @doc varchar (1000)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine--XML documentDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSET @doc ='Di2015NewLine<ROOT>Di2015NewLine    <Employee>Di2015NewLine        <FirstName>Tom</FirstName>Di2015NewLine        <LastName>Jones</LastName>Di2015NewLine    </Employee>Di2015NewLine    <Employee>Di2015NewLine        <FirstName>Gus</FirstName>Di2015NewLine        <LastName>Johnson</LastName>Di2015NewLine    </Employee>Di2015NewLine</ROOT>'Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine--Create an internal representation of the XML documentDi2015NewLine--the idoc variable is set as the document handler, so we can refer to it laterDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineEXEC sp_xml_preparedocument @idoc OUTPUT, @docDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine-- Use the OPENXML rowset provider with an InsertDi2015NewLine-- @idoc lets us know which internal representation of an xml doc to useDi2015NewLine-- '/ROOT/Employee' shows us which node in the xml tree to work onDi2015NewLine-- the 2 denotes we want to use elemenet centric mapping for the values, as oppsed to attributes or a combination of bothDi2015NewLine-- in the 'With' we specify how the output rowset will lookDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineINSERT INTO Employees (FirstName, LastName)Di2015NewLineSELECT *Di2015NewLineFROM OPENXML (@idoc, '/ROOT/Employee',2) Di2015NewLineWITH (FirstName varchar(10),Di2015NewLineLastName varchar(20)Di2015NewLine)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine-- Clear the XML document from memoryDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineEXEC sp_xml_removedocument @idocDi2015NewLine
10910280Di2015UniqueSeparator// Using Reflection to get information from an Assembly:Di2015NewLineSystem.Reflection.Assembly o = System.Reflection.Assembly.Load("mscorlib.dll");Di2015NewLinevar types = o.GetTypes();Di2015NewLine

10912306Di2015UniqueSeparator    public string getWMI(string[] parameters)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string ip = parameters[0];Di2015NewLine        string username = parameters[1];Di2015NewLine        string password = parameters[2];Di2015NewLine        string query = parameters[3];Di2015NewLine        string result = "";Di2015NewLine        ConnectionOptions options = new ConnectionOptions();Di2015NewLine        ManagementScope scope;Di2015NewLine        options.Username = username;Di2015NewLine        options.Password = password;Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            scope = new ManagementScope("\\\\\\\\" + ip + "\\\\root\\\\cimv2", options);Di2015NewLine            scope.Connect();Di2015NewLine            if (scope.IsConnected)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ObjectQuery q = new ObjectQuery(query);Di2015NewLine                ManagementObjectSearcher searcher = new ManagementObjectSearcher(scope, q);Di2015NewLine                ManagementObjectCollection objCol = searcher.Get();Di2015NewLine                foreach (ManagementObject mgtObject in objCol)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    result = result + mgtObject.GetText(TextFormat.CimDtd20);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            writeLogFile("WMI Error: " + e.Message);Di2015NewLine            writeLog("WMI Error: " + e.Message);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

10912887Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static TSource MinBy<TSource>(Di2015NewLine    this IEnumerable<TSource> source,Di2015NewLine    Func<TSource, IComparable> projectionToComparableDi2015NewLine) {Di2015NewLine    using (var e = source.GetEnumerator()) {Di2015NewLine        if (!e.MoveNext()) {Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException("Sequence is empty.");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        TSource min = e.Current;Di2015NewLine        IComparable minProjection = projectionToComparable(e.Current);Di2015NewLine        while (e.MoveNext()) {Di2015NewLine            IComparable currentProjection = projectionToComparable(e.Current);Di2015NewLine            if (currentProjection.CompareTo(minProjection) < 0) {Di2015NewLine                min = e.Current;Di2015NewLine                minProjection = currentProjection;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return min;                Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10914081Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<ILookup<TValue, TKey>> Group<TKey, TValue>Di2015NewLine    (List<TValue> keys,Di2015NewLine     List<TKey> values,Di2015NewLine     bool allowEmptyGroups = false)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var indices = new int[values.Count];Di2015NewLine    var maxIndex = values.Count - 1;Di2015NewLine    var nextIndex = maxIndex;Di2015NewLine    indices[maxIndex] = -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (nextIndex >= 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        indices[nextIndex]++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (indices[nextIndex] == keys.Count)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            indices[nextIndex] = 0;Di2015NewLine            nextIndex--;Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        nextIndex = maxIndex;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!allowEmptyGroups && indices.Distinct().Count() != keys.Count)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            continue;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        yield return indices.Select((keyIndex, valueIndex) =>Di2015NewLine                                    newDi2015NewLine                                        {Di2015NewLine                                            Key = keys[keyIndex],Di2015NewLine                                            Value = values[valueIndex]Di2015NewLine                                        })Di2015NewLine            .OrderBy(x => x.Key)Di2015NewLine            .ToLookup(x => x.Key, x => x.Value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10914081Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<ILookup<TKey[], TValue>> GroupCombined<TKey, TValue>Di2015NewLine    (List<TKey> keys,Di2015NewLine     List<TValue> values)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    for (var i = 1; i <= keys.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var prevs = new List<TKey[][]>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var lookup in Group(Enumerable.Range(0, i).ToList(), keys))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var found = false;Di2015NewLine            var curr = lookup.Select(sub => sub.OrderBy(k => k).ToArray())Di2015NewLine                .OrderBy(arr => arr.FirstOrDefault()).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var prev in prevs.Where(prev => prev.Length == curr.Length))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var isDuplicate = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                for (var x = 0; x < prev.Length; x++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var currSub = curr[x];Di2015NewLine                    var prevSub = prev[x];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (currSub.Length != prevSub.Length ||Di2015NewLine                        !currSub.SequenceEqual(prevSub))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        isDuplicate = false;Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (isDuplicate)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    found = true;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (found)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            prevs.Add(curr);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var group inDi2015NewLine                     Group(lookup.Select(keysComb => keysComb.ToArray()).ToList(),Di2015NewLine                           values))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                yield return group;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10916394Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<string> ToCsv<T>(string separator, IEnumerable<T> objectlist)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    FieldInfo[] fields = typeof(T).GetFields();Di2015NewLine    PropertyInfo[] properties = typeof(T).GetProperties();Di2015NewLine    yield return String.Join(separator, fields.Select(f => f.Name).Union(properties.Select(p=>p.Name)).ToArray());Di2015NewLine    foreach (var o in objectlist)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield return string.Join(separator, fields.Select(f=>(f.GetValue(o) ?? "").ToString())Di2015NewLine            .Union(properties.Select(p=>(p.GetValue(o,null) ?? "").ToString())).ToArray());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10919021Di2015UniqueSeparator    // Field DefinitionsDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Constants that relate to the WndProc messages we wish to intercept and evaluate.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    [System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.SuppressMessage("StyleCop.CSharp.NamingRules", "SA1310:FieldNamesMustNotContainUnderscore", Justification = "Standard practice to use this naming style for Win32 API Constants.")]Di2015NewLine    private const int WM_SYSCOMMAND = 0x0112, SC_MONITORPOWER = 0xF170;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets or sets whether we are suspended. Should coincide with whether the display is turned on or not.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private bool isSuspended = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // New overridden methodDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Intercepts WndProc messages. We are looking for the screen suspend activity. From it, we will return that we are able to suspend and we ourselves will suspend.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="m">Message to be checked.</param>Di2015NewLine    protected override void WndProc(ref Message m)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (m.Msg == WM_SYSCOMMAND)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // The 0x000F bits are used to indicate the specific state and must be ignored to see if this is a monitor power event.Di2015NewLine            if ((m.WParam.ToInt32() & 0xFFF0) == SC_MONITORPOWER)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                switch (m.WParam.ToInt32() & 0x000F)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    case -1:Di2015NewLine                        // Display powering on - resume operationDi2015NewLine#if DEBUGDi2015NewLine                        System.Diagnostics.Debug.WriteLine("Display powered on.");Di2015NewLine#endifDi2015NewLine                        this.isSuspended = false;Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    case 0:Di2015NewLine                    case 1:Di2015NewLine                    case 2:Di2015NewLine                        // Display being powered off - suspend operationDi2015NewLine#if DEBUGDi2015NewLine                        System.Diagnostics.Debug.WriteLine("Display suspended");Di2015NewLine#endifDi2015NewLine                        this.isSuspended = true;Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    default:Di2015NewLine#if DEBUGDi2015NewLine                        System.Diagnostics.Debug.WriteLine(string.Format("Unknown power state: {0}", (m.WParam.ToInt32() & 0x000F).ToString("0")));Di2015NewLine#endifDi2015NewLine                        // Assuming that unknown values mean to power off. This is a WAG.Di2015NewLine                        this.isSuspended = true;Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        base.WndProc(ref m);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Change to my refreshing timer.Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Called when the refresh timer ticks. This invalidates the form, forcing it to be redrawn, which creates a framerate for us.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="sender">Who called this method.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="e">Event Arguments.</param>Di2015NewLine    private void RefreshTimer_Tick(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (this.isSuspended)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Program is in suspended mode, so don't do anything this update.Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Program is not suspended, so invalidate the client area so it can be painted again.Di2015NewLine        this.Invalidate();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

10919178Di2015UniqueSeparatorCREATE FUNCTION dbo.udf_Haversine(@lat1 float, @long1 float, @lat2 float, @long2 float) RETURNS float Di2015NewLine  BEGINDi2015NewLine    DECLARE @dlon float, @dlat float, @rlat1 float, @rlat2 float, @rlong1 float, @rlong2 float, @a float, @c float, @R float, @d float, @DtoR floatDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    SELECT @DtoR = 0.017453293Di2015NewLine    SELECT @R = 3937 --3976Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    SELECT Di2015NewLine        @rlat1 = @lat1 * @DtoR,Di2015NewLine        @rlong1 = @long1 * @DtoR,Di2015NewLine        @rlat2 = @lat2 * @DtoR,Di2015NewLine        @rlong2 = @long2 * @DtoRDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    SELECT Di2015NewLine        @dlon = @rlong1 - @rlong2,Di2015NewLine        @dlat = @rlat1 - @rlat2Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    SELECT @a = power(sin(@dlat/2), 2) + cos(@rlat1) * cos(@rlat2) * power(sin(@dlon/2), 2)Di2015NewLine    SELECT @c = 2 * atn2(sqrt(@a), sqrt(1-@a))Di2015NewLine    SELECT @d = @R * @cDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    RETURN @d Di2015NewLine  ENDDi2015NewLine

           }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public class SilverlightFaultMessageInspector : IDispatchMessageInspectorDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public void */*/*/* reply.IsFault");Di2015NewLine                Trace.WriteLine(reply);Di2015NewLine                var property = new HttpResponseMessageProperty();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //            object faultDetail = ReadFaultDetail(copy);Di2015NewLine                Exception exception = faultDetail as Exception;Di2015NewLine                Trace.WriteLine(exception);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public object AfterReceiveRequest(ref Message request, IClientChannel channel, InstanceContext instanceContext)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Do nothing to the incoming message.Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static object ReadFaultDetail(Message reply)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            const string detailElementName = "Detail";Di2015NewLine            using (XmlDictionaryReader reader = XmlNodeType.Element || reader.LocalName != detailElementName)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return null;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                // 10927632Di2015UniqueSeparator public bool IsValidIP(string addr)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //create our match patternDi2015NewLine        string pattern = @"^([1-9]|[1-9][0-9]|1[0-9][0-9]|2[0-4][0-9]|25[0-5])(\\.Di2015NewLine([0-9]|[1-9][0-9]|1[0-9][0-9]|2[0-4][0-9]|25[0-5])){3}$";Di2015NewLine        //create our Regular Expression objectDi2015NewLine        Regex check = new Regex(pattern);Di2015NewLine        //boolean variable to hold the statusDi2015NewLine        bool valid = false;Di2015NewLine        //check to make sure an ip address was providedDi2015NewLine        if (addr == "")Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //no address provided so return falseDi2015NewLine            valid = false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //address provided so use the IsMatch MethodDi2015NewLine            //of the Regular Expression objectDi2015NewLine            valid = check.IsMatch(addr, 0);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        //return the resultsDi2015NewLine        return valid;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

10929897Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static DateTime AddBusinessDays(DateTime date, int days)Di2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine    if (days == 0) return date;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   if (date.DayOfWeek == DayOfWeek.Saturday)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine    date = date.AddDays(2);Di2015NewLine    days -= 1;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  else if (date.DayOfWeek == DayOfWeek.Sunday)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    date = date.AddDays(1);Di2015NewLine    days -= 1;Di2015NewLine  } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine date = date.AddDays(days / 5 * 7);Di2015NewLine int extraDays = days % 5;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine if ((int)date.DayOfWeek + extraDays > 5)Di2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine    extraDays += 2;Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint extraDaysForHolidays =-1;Di2015NewLine//Load holidays from DB into listDi2015NewLineList<DateTime> dates = GetHolidays();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinewhile(extraDaysForHolidays !=0)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine var days =  dates.Where(x => x >= date  && x <= date.AddDays(extraDays)).Count;Di2015NewLine extraDaysForHolidays =days;Di2015NewLine extraDays+=days;  Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinereturn date.AddDays(extraDays);Di2015NewLine

10931706Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static IEnumerable<ShipmentInformation> Compress(IEnumerable<ShipmentInformation> shipments) Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  var orderedData = shipments.OrderBy(s => s.OuterNo).ThenBy(s => s.Start);Di2015NewLine  using (var enumerator = orderedData.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    ShipmentInformation compressed = null;Di2015NewLine    while (enumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      var current = enumerator.Current;Di2015NewLine      if (compressed == null) Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        compressed = current;Di2015NewLine        continue;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      if (compressed.OuterNo != current.OuterNo || compressed.End < current.Start - 1)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        yield return compressed;Di2015NewLine        compressed = current;Di2015NewLine        continue;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      compressed.End = current.End;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (compressed != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      yield return compressed;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10935833Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IDictionary<string, string> GetProperties<T>(this T obj)Di2015NewLine    where T : classDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var properties = obj.GetPropertyList();Di2015NewLine    return properties.ToDictionary(prop => prop.Item1, prop => prop.Item2);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<Tuple<string, string>> GetPropertyList<T>(this T obj)Di2015NewLine    where T : classDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (obj == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("obj");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Type t = obj.GetType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return GetProperties(obj, t, t.Name);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static IEnumerable<Tuple<string, string>> GetProperties(object obj, Type objType, string propertyPath)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // If atomic property, return property value with path to propertyDi2015NewLine    if (objType.IsValueType || objType.Equals(typeof(string)))Di2015NewLine        return Enumerable.Repeat(Tuple.Create(propertyPath, obj.ToString()), 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Return empty value for null valuesDi2015NewLine        if (obj == null)Di2015NewLine            return Enumerable.Repeat(Tuple.Create(propertyPath, string.Empty), 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Recursively examine properties; add properties to property pathDi2015NewLine            return from prop in objType.GetProperties()Di2015NewLine                   where prop.CanRead && !prop.GetIndexParameters().Any()Di2015NewLine                   let propValue = prop.GetValue(obj, null)Di2015NewLine                   let propType = prop.PropertyTypeDi2015NewLine                   from nameValPair in GetProperties(propValue, propType, string.Format("{0}.{1}", propertyPath, prop.Name))Di2015NewLine                   select nameValPair;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10936310Di2015UniqueSeparatorRandom rand = new Random();Di2015NewLinestring[] words = iTemplate.Text.Split(' ');Di2015NewLine// Insert dots onto at least 4 wordsDi2015NewLineint numInserts = rand.Next(4, words.Count());Di2015NewLine// Used later to store which indexes have already been usedDi2015NewLineDictionary<int, bool> usedIndexes = new Dictionary<int, bool>();Di2015NewLinefor (int i = 0; i < numInserts; i++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int idx = rand.Next(1, words.Count());Di2015NewLine    // Don't process the same word twiceDi2015NewLine    while (usedIndexes.ContainsKey(idx))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        idx = rand.Next(1, words.Count());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine     // Mark this index as usedDi2015NewLine    usedIndexes.Add(idx, true);Di2015NewLine    // Append the dotsDi2015NewLine    words[idx] = words[idx] + new String('.', rand.Next(1, 7));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine// String.Join will put the separator between each word,Di2015NewLine// without the trailing " "Di2015NewLinestring result = String.Join(" ", words);Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(result);Di2015NewLine

10942043Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Type helpersDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLineinternal static class TypeSystemDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static Type FindIEnumerable(Type seqType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type type;Di2015NewLine        if (seqType == null || seqType == typeof(string) || seqType == typeof(byte[]))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!seqType.IsArray)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (seqType.IsGenericType)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Type[] genericArguments = seqType.GetGenericArguments();Di2015NewLine                    int num = 0;Di2015NewLine                    while (num < (int)genericArguments.Length)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Type type1 = genericArguments[num];Di2015NewLine                        Type[] typeArray = new Type[1];Di2015NewLine                        typeArray[0] = type1;Di2015NewLine                        Type type2 = typeof(IEnumerable<>).MakeGenericType(typeArray);Di2015NewLine                        if (!type2.IsAssignableFrom(seqType))Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            num++;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        elseDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            type = type2;Di2015NewLine                            return type;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                Type[] interfaces = seqType.GetInterfaces();Di2015NewLine                if (interfaces != null && (int)interfaces.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Type[] typeArray1 = interfaces;Di2015NewLine                    int num1 = 0;Di2015NewLine                    while (num1 < (int)typeArray1.Length)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Type type3 = typeArray1[num1];Di2015NewLine                        Type type4 = TypeSystem.FindIEnumerable(type3);Di2015NewLine                        if (type4 == null)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            num1++;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        elseDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            type = type4;Di2015NewLine                            return type;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (!(seqType.BaseType != null) || !(seqType.BaseType != typeof(object)))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return null;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return TypeSystem.FindIEnumerable(seqType.BaseType);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Type[] elementType = new Type[1];Di2015NewLine                elementType[0] = seqType.GetElementType();Di2015NewLine                return typeof(IEnumerable<>).MakeGenericType(elementType);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal static Type GetElementType(Type seqType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type type = TypeSystem.FindIEnumerable(seqType);Di2015NewLine        if (type != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return type.GetGenericArguments()[0];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return seqType;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Marks an extension as compatible for custom linq expression expansionDi2015NewLine/// Optionally if you can not write the extension method to fit your needs, you can provide a Di2015NewLine/// expression id constant for a registered expression.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine[AttributeUsage(AttributeTargets.Method, AllowMultiple= false, Inherited = false)]Di2015NewLineclass ExpandableQueryMethodAttribute :Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Walks the expression tree and invokes custom extension methods ( to expand them ) or substitutes them with custom expressionsDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLineclass ExtendableVisitor : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ExpandingVisitor : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private Dictionary<ParameterExpression, Expression> _substitutionDictionary;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public ExpandingVisitor(Dictionary<ParameterExpression, Expression> subDict)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _substitutionDictionary = subDict;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        protected override Expression VisitParameter(ParameterExpression node)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (_substitutionDictionary != null && _substitutionDictionary.ContainsKey(node))Di2015NewLine                return _substitutionDictionary[node];Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                return base.VisitParameter(node);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    IQueryProvider _provider;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    internal ExtendableVisitor()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _provider = new PlaceHolderQueryProvider();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override Expression VisitMethodCall(MethodCallExpression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ExpandableQueryMethodAttribute attrib = (ExpandableQueryMethodAttribute)node.Method.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(ExpandableQueryMethodAttribute), false).FirstOrDefault();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (attrib != null && node.Method.IsStatic)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (attrib.TranslationExpression != null && attrib.TranslationExpression.Parameters.Count == node.Arguments.Count)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Dictionary<ParameterExpression, Expression> subDict = new Dictionary<ParameterExpression,Expression>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                for (int i = 0; i < attrib.TranslationExpression.Parameters.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    subDict.Add(attrib.TranslationExpression.Parameters[i], node.Arguments[i]);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                ExpandingVisitor expander = new ExpandingVisitor(subDict);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Expression exp = expander.Visit(attrib.TranslationExpression.Body);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return exp;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (typeof(IQueryable).IsAssignableFrom(node.Method.ReturnType))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                object[] args = new object[node.Arguments.Count];Di2015NewLine                args[0] = _provider.CreateQuery(node.Arguments[0]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                for (int i = 1; i < node.Arguments.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Expression arg = node.Arguments[i];Di2015NewLine                    args[i] = (arg.NodeType == ExpressionType.Constant) ? ((ConstantExpression)arg).Value : arg;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Expression exp = ((IQueryable)node.Method.Invoke(null, args)).Expression;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return exp;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }            Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return base.VisitMethodCall(node);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Used for query compilationDi2015NewLine/// Di2015NewLine/// If custom extension 10942758Di2015UniqueSeparator    private class CanceledTaskCache<A>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static Task<A> Instance;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Task<A> GetCanceledTask<A>()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (CanceledTaskCache<A>.Instance == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var aa = new TaskCompletionSource<A>();Di2015NewLine            aa.SetCanceled();Di2015NewLine            CanceledTaskCache<A>.Instance = aa.Task;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return CanceledTaskCache<A>.Instance;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static Task<A> Peirce<A, B>(Func<Func<A, Task<B>>, Task<A>> a)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var aa = new TaskCompletionSource<A>();Di2015NewLine        Func<A, Task<B>> cb = b =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            aa.SetResult(b);Di2015NewLine            return GetCanceledTask<B>();Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine        return Task.WhenAny(aa.Task, a(cb)).Unwrap();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

10942935Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<TSource> Where<TSource>(this IEnumerable<TSource> source, Func<TSource, bool> predicate)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (source == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw Error.ArgumentNull("source");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (predicate == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw Error.ArgumentNull("predicate");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (source is Iterator<TSource>)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return ((Iterator<TSource>) source).Where(predicate);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (source is TSource[])Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new WhereArrayIterator<TSource>((TSource[]) source, predicate);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (source is List<TSource>)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new WhereListIterator<TSource>((List<TSource>) source, predicate);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return new WhereEnumerableIterator<TSource>(source, predicate);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10942935Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate class WhereSelectEnumerableIterator<TSource, TResult> : Enumerable.Iterator<TResult>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private IEnumerator<TSource> enumerator;Di2015NewLine    private Func<TSource, bool> predicate;Di2015NewLine    private Func<TSource, TResult> selector;Di2015NewLine    private IEnumerable<TSource> source;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public WhereSelectEnumerableIterator(IEnumerable<TSource> source, Func<TSource, bool> predicate, Func<TSource, TResult> selector)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.source = source;Di2015NewLine        this.predicate = predicate;Di2015NewLine        this.selector = selector;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override Enumerable.Iterator<TResult> Clone()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new Enumerable.WhereSelectEnumerableIterator<TSource, TResult>(this.source, this.predicate, this.selector);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (this.enumerator != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.enumerator.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        this.enumerator = null;Di2015NewLine        base.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override this.source.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLine                base.state = 2;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            case 2:Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                goto Label_007C;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        while (this.enumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            TSource current = this.enumerator.Current;Di2015NewLine            if ((this.predicate == null) || this.predicate(current))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                base.current = this.selector(current);Di2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        this.Dispose();Di2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine        return new Enumerable.WhereSelectEnumerableIterator<TSource, TResult2>(this.source, this.predicate, Enumerable.CombineSelectors<TSource, TResult, TResult2>(this.selector, selector));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override IEnumerable<TResult> Where(Func<TResult, bool> predicate)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (IEnumerable<TResult>) 10944710Di2015UniqueSeparator^      # Start of lineDi2015NewLine.*     # Match any number of characters except newlinesDi2015NewLine<      # Match a <Di2015NewLine(?:    # Either match a...Di2015NewLine /?b   #  b or /bDi2015NewLine|      # or Di2015NewLine /?em  #  em or /emDi2015NewLine|...   # etc. etc.Di2015NewLine)      # End of alternationDi2015NewLine>      # Match a >Di2015NewLine(?! )  # Assert that no space followsDi2015NewLine.*     # Match any number of characters until...Di2015NewLine$      # End of lineDi2015NewLine

10946683Di2015UniqueSeparatorbyte[] Encrypt(byte[] plain){Di2015NewLine  using (FileStream keyFile = new FileStream(FileName, FileMode.Open))Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    keyFile.Seek(-plain.Length, SeekOrigin.End);Di2015NewLine    byte[] key = new byte[plain.Length];Di2015NewLine    keyFile.Read(key, 0, plain.Length);    Di2015NewLine    byte[] encrypted = new byte[plain.Length];Di2015NewLine    for(int i=0;i<plain.Length;i++){Di2015NewLine      encrypted[i] = (byte) (plain[i] ^ key[plain.Length - 1 - i]);Di2015NewLine    } Di2015NewLine    keyFile.SetLength(keyFile.Length - plain.Length);   Di2015NewLine    return encrypted;Di2015NewLine  }      Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10948013Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate abstract class LogicDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    protected double FVAL(object arg)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // put code hereDi2015NewLine        return 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected double ORGVAL(object arg)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // put code hereDi2015NewLine        return 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected double ORGVAL(object arg, string date)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // put code hereDi2015NewLine        return 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public abstract double GetValue(object PFC, object BAS, object DA);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate class DynamicLogic : LogicDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public override double GetValue(object PFC, object BAS, object DA)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (FVAL(PFC) = true ? ((ORGVAL(BAS, "2012/12/31") + ORGVAL(DA)) < 6500 ? (FVAL(BAS) + FVAL(DA)) * .12 : 780) : 0);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate Logic GenerateLogic(string code)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (CSharpCodeProvider provider = new CSharpCodeProvider())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder classCode = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        classCode.AppendLine("private class DynamicLogic : Logic");Di2015NewLine        classCode.AppendLine("    {");Di2015NewLine        classCode.AppendLine("        public override int GetValue(object PFC, object BAS, object DA)");Di2015NewLine        classCode.AppendLine("        {");Di2015NewLine        classCode.AppendLine("            return (" + code + ");");Di2015NewLine        classCode.AppendLine("        }");Di2015NewLine        classCode.AppendLine("    }");Di2015NewLine        CompilerParameters p = new CompilerParameters();Di2015NewLine        p.GenerateInMemory = true;Di2015NewLine        p.ReferencedAssemblies.Add(Assembly.GetExecutingAssembly().Location);Di2015NewLine        CompilerResults results = provider.CompileAssemblyFromSource(p, code);Di2015NewLine        return (Logic)Activator.CreateInstance(type);Di2015NewLine        if (results.Errors.HasErrors)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception("Failed to compile DynamicLogic class");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return (Logic)results.CompiledAssembly.CreateInstance("DynamicLogic");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate double evaluate(object PFC, object BAS, object DA)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Logic logic = GenerateLogic("FVAL(PFC) = true ? ((ORGVAL(BAS, \\"2012/12/31\\") + ORGVAL(DA)) < 6500 ? (FVAL(BAS) + FVAL(DA)) * .12  : 780) : 0");Di2015NewLine    return logic.GetValue(PFC, BAS, DA);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10949887Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void GetEnvelope(PointF[] curve, out PointF[] left, out PointF[] right, float offset)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            left = new PointF[curve.Length - 1];Di2015NewLine            right = new PointF[curve.Length - 1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 1; i < curve.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                PointF normal = new PointF(curve[i].Y - curve[i - 1].Y, curve[i - 1].X - curve[i].X);Di2015NewLine                float length = (float)Math.Sqrt(normal.X * normal.X + normal.Y * normal.Y);Di2015NewLine                normal.X /= length;Di2015NewLine                normal.Y /= length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                PointF midpoint = new PointF((curve[i - 1].X + curve[i].X) / 2F, (curve[i - 1].Y + curve[i].Y) / 2F);Di2015NewLine                left[i - 1] = new PointF(midpoint.X - (normal.X * offset), midpoint.Y - (normal.Y * offset));Di2015NewLine                right[i - 1] = new PointF(midpoint.X + (normal.X * offset), midpoint.Y + (normal.Y * offset));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

10951577Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class VectorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private const double Eps = 1e-7;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Vector(double x, double y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _x = x;Di2015NewLine        _y = y;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private double _x;Di2015NewLine    public double XDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _x; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private double _y;Di2015NewLine    public double YDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _y; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Vector operator +(Vector a, Vector b)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new Vector(a._x + b._x, a._y + b._y);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Vector operator *(double d, Vector v)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new Vector(d * v._x, d * v._y);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool operator ==(Vector a, Vector b)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (ReferenceEquals(a, null)) {Di2015NewLine            return ReferenceEquals(b, null);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (ReferenceEquals(b, null)) {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return Math.Abs(a._x - b._x) < Eps && Math.Abs(a._y - b._y) < Eps;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool operator !=(Vector a, Vector b)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return !(a == b);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static implicit operator Vector(double[] point)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new Vector(point[0], point[1]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static implicit operator Vector(PointF point)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new Vector(point.X, point.Y);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override int GetHashCode()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return _x.GetHashCode() ^ _y.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override bool Equals(object obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var other = obj as Vector;Di2015NewLine        return other != null && Math.Abs(other._x - _x) < Eps && Math.Abs(other._y - _y) < Eps;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return String.Format("Vector({0:0.0000}, {1:0.0000})", _x, _y);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10951781Di2015UniqueSeparator    private BasicEffect mBasicEffect;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Draw(GraphicsDevice graphicsDevice)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // If we haven't set this up yet then do so nowDi2015NewLine        if (mBasicEffect == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            CreateBasicEffect(graphicsDevice);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (EffectPass pass in mBasicEffect.CurrentTechnique.Passes)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            pass.Apply();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int num = mCorners.Length + 1;Di2015NewLine            short[] triangleStripIndices = new short[num];Di2015NewLine            VertexPositionColor[] primitiveList = new VertexPositionColor[num];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < num; ++i)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int index = i % mCorners.Length;Di2015NewLine                Vector2 vec = mCorners[index];Di2015NewLine                primitiveList[index] = new VertexPositionColor(new Vector3(vec, 0), Color.White);Di2015NewLine                triangleStripIndices[i] = (short)i;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            graphicsDevice.DrawUserIndexedPrimitives<VertexPositionColor>(PrimitiveType.LineStrip, primitiveList, 0, 5, triangleStripIndices, 0, 4);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void CreateBasicEffect(GraphicsDevice device)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        mBasicEffect = new BasicEffect(device);Di2015NewLine        mBasicEffect.VertexColorEnabled = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Matrix viewMatrix = Matrix.CreateLookAt(new Vector3(0, 0, 1), Vector3.Zero, Vector3.Up);Di2015NewLine        Matrix worldMatrix = Matrix.CreateTranslation(0, 0, 0);Di2015NewLine        Matrix projectionMatrix = Matrix.CreateOrthographicOffCenter(0, device.Viewport.Width, device.Viewport.Height, 0, 1, 1000);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        mBasicEffect.World = worldMatrix;Di2015NewLine        mBasicEffect.View = viewMatrix;Di2015NewLine        mBasicEffect.Projection = projectionMatrix;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
10951856Di2015UniqueSeparatorK00000WEFLZ

10951856Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string RegStringZipper(string searchString)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        char lastChar = new char();Di2015NewLine        bool plusFlag = false;Di2015NewLine        foreach (char c in searchString)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (sb.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sb.Append(c);Di2015NewLine                lastChar = c;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (lastChar == c)Di2015NewLine                {//we have a repeating characterDi2015NewLine                    //Note: Here is also where if you only wanted to filter a specific character, like 0, you would check for it.Di2015NewLine                    if (!plusFlag)Di2015NewLine                    {//we have not already added the +Di2015NewLine                        sb.Append('+');Di2015NewLine                        plusFlag = true;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    //else do nothing, skip the characerDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    sb.Append(c);Di2015NewLine                    plusFlag = false;Di2015NewLine                    lastChar = c;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

10953294Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static FolderItem GetShellFolderItem(string path)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (!FileProcessing.IsFile(path))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("Path did not lead to a file", path);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int index = -1; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //get the index of the path itemDi2015NewLine    FileInfo info = new FileInfo(path);Di2015NewLine    DirectoryInfo directoryInfo = info.Directory;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < directoryInfo.GetFileSystemInfos().Count(); i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (directoryInfo.GetFileSystemInfos().ElementAt(i).Name == info.Name) //we've found the item in the folderDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            index = i;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return GetShellFolder(path).Items().Item(index);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

Di2015NewLine        HttpWebRequest request = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create(loginurl);Di2015NewLine        // Set the Method property of the request to POST.Di2015NewLine        request.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        CookieContainer container = new CookieContainer();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (cookieName != null)Di2015NewLine            container.Add(new Cookie(cookieName, username, "/", new Uri(loginurl).Host));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        request.CookieContainer = container;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create POST data and convert it to a byte array.    // Set the ContentLength property of the WebRequest.Di2015NewLine        request.ContentLength = byteArray.Length;Di2015NewLine        // Get the request stream.Di2015NewLine        Stream dataStream = request.GetRequestStream();Di2015NewLine        // Write the data to the request stream.Di2015NewLine        dataStream.Write(byteArray, 0, byteArray.Length);Di2015NewLine        // Close the Stream object.Di2015NewLine        dataStream.Close();Di2015NewLine        // Get the response.Di2015NewLine        WebResponse response = request.GetResponse();Di2015NewLine        // Get the access.Di2015NewLine        StreamReader reader = new StreamReader(dataStream);Di2015NewLine        // Read the content.Di2015NewLine        string responseFromServer = reader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (StreamWriter outfile =Di2015NewLine        new StreamWriter("output.html"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            outfile.Write(responseFromServer.ToString());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Clean up the streams.Di2015NewLine        reader.Close();Di2015NewLine        dataStream.Close();Di2015NewLine        response.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        request = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create(secondurl);Di2015NewLine        request.CookieContainer = container;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        response = request.GetResponse();Di2015NewLine        // Get the stream containing content returned by the server.Di2015NewLine        dataStream = response.GetResponseStream();Di2015NewLine        // Open the stream using a StreamReader for easy access.Di2015NewLine        reader = new StreamReader(dataStream);Di2015NewLine        // Read the content.Di2015NewLine        responseFromServer = reader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Clean up the streams.Di2015NewLine        reader.Close();Di2015NewLine        dataStream.Close();Di2015NewLine        response.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return responseFromServer;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool 10956388Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Drawing;Di2015NewLineusing System.Drawing.Imaging;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Forms;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass MetronomeControl : ControlDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Bitmap hand;Di2015NewLine    private float angle = 0;Di2015NewLine    private float direction = 2;Di2015NewLine    private Timer timer = new Timer { Enabled = true, Interval = 30 };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public MetronomeControl()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        SetStyle(ControlStyles.OptimizedDoubleBuffer | ControlStyles.UserPaint | ControlStyles.Opaque | ControlStyles.AllPaintingInWmPaint, true);Di2015NewLine        hand = CreateCrappyHandBitmap();Di2015NewLine        timer.Tick += new EventHandler(timer_Tick);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void timer_Tick(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (angle < -45 || angle > 45)Di2015NewLine            direction = -direction;Di2015NewLine        angle += direction;Di2015NewLine        Invalidate();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Bitmap CreateCrappyHandBitmap()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Bitmap bitmap = new Bitmap(100, 300, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);Di2015NewLine        using (Graphics graphics = Graphics.FromImage(bitmap))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            graphics.Clear(Color.Transparent);Di2015NewLine            graphics.FillRectangle(Brushes.LightGray, 50 - 5, 0, 10, 300);Di2015NewLine            graphics.FillPolygon(Brushes.LightSlateGray, new Point[] { new Point(50 - 30, 40), new Point(50 + 30, 40), new Point(50 + 20, 80), new Point(50 - 20, 80) });Di2015NewLine            graphics.FillEllipse(Brushes.LightSlateGray, 0, 200, 100, 100);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return bitmap;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void OnPaint(PaintEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Erase background since we specified AllPaintingInWmPaintDi2015NewLine        e.Graphics.Clear(Color.AliceBlue);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        e.Graphics.DrawString(Text, Font, Brushes.Black, new RectangleF(0, 0, ClientSize.Width, ClientSize.Height), new StringFormat { Alignment = StringAlignment.Center, LineAlignment = StringAlignment.Center });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Move the 0,0 point to the just below the bottom-center of our client areaDi2015NewLine        e.Graphics.TranslateTransform(ClientSize.Width / 2, ClientSize.Height + 40);Di2015NewLine        // Rotate around this new 0,0Di2015NewLine        e.Graphics.RotateTransform(angle);Di2015NewLine        // Turn on AA to make it a bit less jagged lookingDi2015NewLine        e.Graphics.SmoothingMode = System.Drawing.Drawing2D.SmoothingMode.AntiAlias;Di2015NewLine        // Draw the image so that the center of the ellipse is at 0,0Di2015NewLine        e.Graphics.DrawImage(hand, 0 - hand.Width / 2, 0 - hand.Height + 50);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Reset the transform for other drawingDi2015NewLine        e.Graphics.ResetTransform();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        base.OnPaint(e);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    [STAThread]Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Application.EnableVisualStyles();Di2015NewLine        Application.SetCompatibleTextRenderingDefault(false);Di2015NewLine        Application.Run(new FormDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Text = "Metronome Control Demo",Di2015NewLine            ClientSize = new Size(640, 480),Di2015NewLine            Controls =Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                new MetronomeControlDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Location = new Point(10, 10),Di2015NewLine                    Size = new Size (340, 300),Di2015NewLine                    Font = new Font(FontFamily.GenericSansSerif, 24),Di2015NewLine                    Text = "Metronome Control Demo",Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10965388Di2015UniqueSeparatorSELECTDi2015NewLine    ContentPath, [Days (Old)], FileName, [Creation Date Time]Di2015NewLine    USING creationtime AS [Creation Date Time],Di2015NewLine    TO_DATE([Creation Date Time]) AS Cdate,Di2015NewLine    SUB(TO_LOCALTIME(SYSTEM_TIMESTAMP()), Cdate) AS Days,Di2015NewLine    DIV(TO_INT(Days),86400) As [Days (Old)],Di2015NewLine    EXTRACT_PATH(TO_LOWERCASE(path)) AS ContentPath,Di2015NewLine    TO_LOWERCASE(name) AS FileNameDi2015NewLineFROM %source% Di2015NewLineWHEREDi2015NewLine  (attributes NOT LIKE 'D%')Di2015NewLineANDDi2015NewLine  ([Days (Old)] >= TO_INT('%day%'))Di2015NewLineORDER BY [Creation Date Time] DESCDi2015NewLine

10965677Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<string> GetFiles( string path, string[] searchPatterns, SearchOption searchOption = SearchOption.TopDirectoryOnly) {Di2015NewLine    DirectoryInfo dir = new DirectoryInfo(path);Di2015NewLine    var dirs = (from file in dir.EnumerateFiles(searchPatterns, searchOptions)Di2015NewLine            orderby file.CreationTime ascendingDi2015NewLine            select file.Name).Distinct(); // Don't need <string> here, since it's impliedDi2015NewLine    return dirs;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10968106Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ModemReader r = new ModemReader();Di2015NewLine        r.StartReading();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    class ModemReader{Di2015NewLine        string buff="";Di2015NewLine        public void StartReading()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string ok = "OK";Di2015NewLine            SerialPort p = new SerialPort("COM28");Di2015NewLine            p.DataReceived += new SerialDataReceivedEventHandler(p_DataReceived);Di2015NewLine            p.Open();Di2015NewLine            string line = "1";Di2015NewLine            p.Write("AT" + "\\r");Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("buff: \\"{0}\\"\\nok: \\"{1}\\"", buff, ok);Di2015NewLine            p.Write("AT+CMGF=1"+ "\\r" );Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("buff: \\"{0}\\"\\nok: \\"{1}\\"", buff, ok);Di2015NewLine            doDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Clear the buffer hereDi2015NewLine                buff = "";  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                p.Write("AT+CMGL=\\"REC UNREAD\\" " + "\\r");Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("buff: \\"{0}\\"\\nok: \\"{1}\\"", buff, ok);Di2015NewLine                if (buff.Contains(ok))Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("Everything is OK");Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("NOK");Di2015NewLine                line = Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine            } while (line != "quit");Di2015NewLine            p.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public void p_DataReceived(object sender, SerialDataReceivedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string s = (sender as SerialPort).ReadExisting();Di2015NewLine            buff += s;Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(s);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine

10969612Di2015UniqueSeparatorRichTextBox
10969612Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void boldToolStripButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ToggleFontStyle(FontStyle.Bold);Di2015NewLine    boldToolStripButton.Checked = !boldToolStripButton.Checked;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void ToggleFontStyle(FontStyle style)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int selStart = richTextBox.SelectionStart;Di2015NewLine    int selLength = richTextBox.SelectionLength;Di2015NewLine    int selEnd = selStart + selLength;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (selLength == 0) {Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Font selFont = richTextBox.SelectionFont;Di2015NewLine    if (selFont == null) {Di2015NewLine        richTextBox.Select(selStart, 1);Di2015NewLine        selFont = richTextBox.SelectionFont;Di2015NewLine        if (selFont == null) {Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    bool set = (selFont.Style & style) == FontStyle.Regular;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int from = selStart, len = 1; from < selEnd; from += len) {Di2015NewLine        richTextBox.Select(from, 1);Di2015NewLine        Font refFont = richTextBox.SelectionFont;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = from + 1; i < selEnd; i++, len++) {Di2015NewLine            richTextBox.Select(i, 1);Di2015NewLine            if (!refFont.Equals(richTextBox.SelectionFont))Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        richTextBox.Select(from, len);Di2015NewLine        if (set) {Di2015NewLine            richTextBox.SelectionFont = new Font(refFont, refFont.Style | style);Di2015NewLine        } else {Di2015NewLine            richTextBox.SelectionFont = new Font(refFont, refFont.Style & ~style);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // Restore the original selectionDi2015NewLine    richTextBox.Select(selStart, selLength);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10969721Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var currentDir = Directory.GetCurrentDirectory();Di2015NewLine    var xDoc = XDocument.Load(string.Format(Path.Combine(currentDir, "Hosts.xml")));Di2015NewLine    var taskFactory = new TaskFactory();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (XElement host in xDoc.Descendants("Host"))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var hostId = (int) host.Attribute("id");Di2015NewLine        var extension = (string) host.Element("Extension");Di2015NewLine        var folderPath = (string) host.Element("FolderPath");Di2015NewLine        taskFactory.StartNew(() => DoWork(hostId, extension, folderPath));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    //Carry on with your other workDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void DoWork(int hostId, string extension, string folderPath)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //Do stuff hereDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
10969721Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var currentDir = Directory.GetCurrentDirectory();Di2015NewLine    var xDoc = XDocument.Load(string.Format(Path.Combine(currentDir, "Hosts.xml")));Di2015NewLine    var threads = new List<Thread>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (XElement host in xDoc.Descendants("Host"))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var hostID = (int) host.Attribute("id");Di2015NewLine        var extension = (string) host.Element("Extension");Di2015NewLine        var folderPath = (string) host.Element("FolderPath");Di2015NewLine        var thread = new Thread(DoWork)Di2015NewLine                         {Di2015NewLine                             Name = string.Format("samplethread{0}", hostID)Di2015NewLine                         };Di2015NewLine        thread.Start(new FileInfoDi2015NewLine                         {Di2015NewLine                             HostId = hostID,Di2015NewLine                             Extension = extension,Di2015NewLine                             FolderPath = folderPathDi2015NewLine                         });Di2015NewLine        threads.Add(thread);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    //Carry on with your other work, then wait for worker threadsDi2015NewLine    threads.ForEach(t => t.Join());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void DoWork(object threadState)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var fileInfo = threadState as FileInfo;Di2015NewLine    if (fileInfo != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Do stuff hereDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass FileInfoDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int HostId { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string Extension { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string FolderPath { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10974326Di2015UniqueSeparatorPreferencedDecisionMaker pdm = new PreferencedDecisionMaker();Di2015NewLinepdm.Push(false, leftExists, rightExists, upExists, downExists);Di2015NewLinepdm.Push(0);Di2015NewLinepdm.Push(false, leftFree,   rightFree,   upFree,   downFree  );Di2015NewLinepdm.Push(false, pushedLeft, pushedRight, pushedUp, pushedDown);Di2015NewLinepdm.Push(1);Di2015NewLineswitch(pdm.Decision)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    case 1: GoLeft();  break;Di2015NewLine    case 2: GoRight(); break;Di2015NewLine    case 3: GoUp();    break;Di2015NewLine    case 4: GoDown();  break;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
10974326Di2015UniqueSeparatorPreferencedDecisionMaker
10974326Di2015UniqueSeparatorPush
10974326Di2015UniqueSeparatorstruct PreferencedDecisionMakerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private uint availableOptionsBits;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static readonly int[] MultiplyDeBruijnBitPosition = {Di2015NewLine        0, 1, 28, 2, 29, 14, 24, 3, 30, 22, 20, 15, 25, 17, 4, 8, Di2015NewLine        31, 27, 13, 23, 21, 19, 16, 7, 26, 12, 18, 6, 11, 5, 10, 9Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int DecisionDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            uint v = availableOptionsBits;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Find position of lowest set bit in constant timeDi2015NewLine            // http://stackoverflow.com/a/757266/165500Di2015NewLine            return MultiplyDeBruijnBitPosition[((uint)((v & -v) * 0x077CB531U)) >> 27];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void InternalPush(uint preference)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(availableOptionsBits == 0)Di2015NewLine            availableOptionsBits = preference;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            uint combinedBits = availableOptionsBits & preference;Di2015NewLine            if(combinedBits != 0)Di2015NewLine                availableOptionsBits = combinedBits;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Push(int option)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(option < 0 || option >= 32) throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("Option must be between 0 and 31");Di2015NewLine        InternalPush(1u << option);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // ... etc ...Di2015NewLine    public void Push(bool p0, bool p1, bool p2, bool p3, bool p4) { InternalPush((p0?1u:0u) | ((p1?1u:0u)<<1) | ((p2?1u:0u)<<2) | ((p3?1u:0u)<<3) | ((p4?1u:0u)<<4)); }Di2015NewLine    // ... etc ...Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
10974467Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> TransposeOverhanging<T>(Di2015NewLine    this IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var enumerators = source.Select(e => e.GetEnumerator()).ToArray();Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        T[] g;Di2015NewLine        doDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return g = enumeratorsDi2015NewLine                .Where(e => e.MoveNext()).Select(e => e.Current).ToArray();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        while (g.Any());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finallyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Array.ForEach(enumerators, e => e.Dispose());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10974598Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate struct HttpPostParamDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private string _key;Di2015NewLine    private string _value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string Key { get { return HttpUtility.UrlEncode(this._key); } set { this._key = value; } }Di2015NewLine    public string Value { get { return HttpUtility.UrlEncode(this._value); } set { this._value = value; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public HttpPostParam(string key, string value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this._key = key;Di2015NewLine        this._value = value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static string PostTrivialData(Uri page, HttpPostParam[] parameters)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string pageResponse = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var request = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create(page); //create the initial request.Di2015NewLine        request.Method = WebRequestMethods.Http.Post; //set the methodDi2015NewLine        request.AllowAutoRedirect = true; //couple of settings I personally prefer.Di2015NewLine        request.KeepAlive = true;Di2015NewLine        request.ContentType = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //create the post data.Di2015NewLine        byte[] bData = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(string.Join("&", Array.ConvertAll(parameters, kvp => string.Format("{0}={1}", kvp.Key, kvp.Value))));Di2015NewLine        using (var reqStream = request.GetRequestStream())Di2015NewLine            reqStream.Write(bData, 0, bData.Length); //write the data to the request.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (var response = (HttpWebResponse)request.GetResponse()) //attempt to get the response.Di2015NewLine            if (response.StatusCode == HttpStatusCode.OK || response.StatusCode == HttpStatusCode.NotModified) //check for a valid status (should only return 200 if successful)Di2015NewLine                using (var reader = new System.IO.StreamReader(response.GetResponseStream()))Di2015NewLine                    pageResponse = reader.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /* todo: any error handling, for my use case failing gracefully was all that was needed. */Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return pageResponse;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

10980205Di2015UniqueSeparator        HtmlWeb web = new HtmlWeb();Di2015NewLine        HtmlDocument doc = web.Load("http://www.google.com/finance?q=NASDAQ:TXN&fstype=ii");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // How get a specific line:Di2015NewLine        // 1) recursively get all DIV elements with the 'id' attribute set to 'casannualdiv'Di2015NewLine        // 2) get all TABLE elements under, with the 'id' attribute set to 'fs-table'Di2015NewLine        // 3) recursively get all TD elements containing the given text (trimmed)Di2015NewLine        foreach (HtmlNode node in doc.DocumentNode.SelectNodes("//div[@id='casannualdiv']/table[@id='fs-table']//td[normalize-space(text()) = 'Deferred Taxes']"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Title:" + node.InnerHtml.Trim());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // get all following sibling TD elementsDi2015NewLine            foreach (HtmlNode sibling in node.SelectNodes("following-sibling::td"))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(" data:" + sibling.InnerText.Trim()); // InnerText works also for negative valuesDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // How to get all lines:Di2015NewLine        // 1) recursively get all DIV elements with the 'id' attribute set to 'casannualdiv'Di2015NewLine        // 2) get all TABLE elements under, with the 'id' attribute set to 'fs-table'Di2015NewLine        // 3) recursively get all TD elements containing the class 'lft lm'Di2015NewLine        foreach (HtmlNode node in doc.DocumentNode.SelectNodes("//div[@id='casannualdiv']/table[@id='fs-table']//td[@class='lft lm']"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Title:" + node.InnerHtml.Trim());Di2015NewLine            foreach (HtmlNode sibling in node.SelectNodes("following-sibling::td"))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(" data:" + sibling.InnerText.Trim());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

10980298Di2015UniqueSeparator// Each row returned from the database will be converted in to one of these.Di2015NewLine     public class ChatEntryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            public string UserName { get; set; }Di2015NewLine            public string Message { get; set; }Di2015NewLine            public int MessageID { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// You will need to introduce a MessageID field to your database to make this method work.Di2015NewLine    public partial class MainWindow : WindowDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public ObservableCollection<ChatEntry> EntriesDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return (ObservableCollection<ChatEntry>)GetValue(EntriesProperty); }Di2015NewLine            set { SetValue(EntriesProperty, value); }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static readonly DependencyProperty EntriesProperty = DependencyProperty.Register("Entries", typeof(ObservableCollection<ChatEntry>), typeof(MainWindow), new UIPropertyMetadata(null));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // This will be used to make sure that only new entries are added to the chat log.Di2015NewLine        int lastMessageID;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // This will be used to call UpdateEntries every second.Di2015NewLine        Thread updateThread;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public MainWindow()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Entries = new ObservableCollection<ChatEntry>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            updateThread = new Thread(new ThreadStart(UpdateEntries));Di2015NewLine            updateThread.Start();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        void UpdateEntries()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Prepare your query to gather messages from the message tableDi2015NewLine                // with MessageID > lastMessageID.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // This bit needs to be done on the UI dispatcher or it'll cause an exception.Di2015NewLine                this.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke(new Action(() =>Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // Each row that came back is a new message and can be added to the collection.Di2015NewLine                        foreach (var row in rows)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            Entries.Add(new ChatEntry()Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                UserName = (string)row["UserName"],Di2015NewLine                                Message = (string)row["Message"],Di2015NewLine                            });Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // at this point, the UI will have been upadted with JUST the new entries, no flickerDi2015NewLine                // no scrolling to the top each second.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // just one more thing, we need to set lastMessageID to be the latest messageID Di2015NewLine                // so next time UpdateEntries is called it'll only get the new ones that we don't Di2015NewLine                // have yet.Di2015NewLine                lastMessageID = Entries.Max(x => x.MessageID);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Sleep for a second to ease the update speed.Di2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(1000);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
